  2478 00001272 00                      		db 0
  2479                                  
  2480                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2481                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  2482                                  ;***************************************************************************
  2483                                  
  2484                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  2485                                  
  2486                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  2487                                  ;
  2488                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  2489                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  2490                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  2491                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  2492                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  2493                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  2494                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  2495                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  2496                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  2497                                  ;
  2498                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  2499                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  2500                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  2501                                  ;
  2502                                  ;	uses:	
  2503                                  ;
  2504                                  ;
  2505                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  2506                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  2507                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  2508                                  ;
  2509                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  2510                                  
  2511                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2512                                  ; 28/05/2019
  2513                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  2514                                  
  2515                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  2516                                  
  2517                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  2518                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  2519                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  2520                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  2521                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  2522                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  2523                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  2524                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  2525                                  
  2526                                  ; 01/10/2022
  2527                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  2528                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  2529                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  2530                                  
  2531                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  2532 00001273 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  2533 00001276 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  2534 00001278 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  2535 0000127B 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  2536 0000127D 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  2537 00001280 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  2538                                  atd1:
  2539 00001282 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  2540                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  2541                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2542                                  
  2543                                  atd2:					
  2544 00001287 53                      		push	bx
  2545 00001288 51                      		push	cx
  2546 00001289 52                      		push	dx
  2547 0000128A 57                      		push	di
  2548 0000128B 1E                      		push	ds
  2549 0000128C 06                      		push	es
  2550 0000128D 50                      		push	ax
  2551 0000128E B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  2552                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  2553 00001291 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2554                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2555 00001293 C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  2556                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  2557                                  					; initially no error code.
  2558 00001298 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  2559 0000129B 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  2560                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  2561 0000129F 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  2562                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  2563 000012A1 C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  2564 000012A6 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  2565                                  					; return
  2566                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2567                                  
  2568                                  atd3:					
  2569 000012A8 53                      		push	bx
  2570 000012A9 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  2571 000012AB C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  2572 000012AE 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  2573 000012B0 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  2574 000012B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  2575 000012B3 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  2576 000012B6 0E                      		push	cs
  2577 000012B7 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  2578 000012BA 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  2579 000012BC 58                      		pop	ax
  2580 000012BD 50                      		push	ax
  2581 000012BE E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  2582 000012C1 BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  2583 000012C4 EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  2584 000012C5 E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  2585                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2586                                  
  2587                                  atd4:	
  2588                                  
  2589                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  2590                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  2591                                  				
  2592 000012C8 58                      		pop	ax
  2593                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  2594 000012C9 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  2595 000012CD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  2596 000012CF 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  2597 000012D1 F9                      		stc
  2598                                  atd5:					
  2599 000012D2 07                      		pop	es
  2600 000012D3 1F                      		pop	ds
  2601 000012D4 5F                      		pop	di
  2602 000012D5 5A                      		pop	dx
  2603 000012D6 59                      		pop	cx
  2604 000012D7 5B                      		pop	bx
  2605 000012D8 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  2606                                  
  2607                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2608                                  
  2609                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  2610                                  ;
  2611                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  2612                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  2613                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  2614                                  ;	
  2615                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  2616                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  2617                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  2618                                  ;
  2619                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  2620                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  2621                                  ;
  2622                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  2623                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  2624                                  
  2625                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  2626                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  2627                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2628 000012DB A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  2629                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  2630 000012DE C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  2631 000012E3 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  2632 000012E6 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  2633 000012E8 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  2634                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  2635                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  2636                                  setc1:					
  2637 000012ED 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  2638 000012EF 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  2639                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  2640                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  2641 000012F1 A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  2642 000012F4 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  2643 000012F8 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  2644 000012FA C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  2645                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  2646 000012FD A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  2647 00001300 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  2648 00001302 C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  2649 00001305 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  2650 00001308 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  2651 0000130A 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  2652                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  2653 0000130C A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  2654 0000130F 06                      		push	es
  2655 00001310 53                      		push	bx
  2656 00001311 0E                      		push	cs
  2657 00001312 E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  2658 00001315 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  2659                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  2660 00001319 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  2661                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  2662 0000131C A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  2663                                  					; only use low part
  2664 0000131F 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  2665                                  					; control byte modifier
  2666 00001323 5B                      		pop	bx
  2667 00001324 07                      		pop	es
  2668                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  2669 00001325 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  2670 00001329 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  2671 0000132C 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  2672                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  2673 0000132E 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  2674 00001332 C3                      		retn
  2675                                  
  2676                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2677                                  
  2678                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  2679                                  ;
  2680                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  2681                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  2682                                  ;
  2683                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  2684                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  2685                                  ;
  2686                                  ;	
  2687                                  ;
  2688                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  2689                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  2690                                  ;
  2691                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  2692                                  ;		performs disk input.
  2693                                  
  2694                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  2695 00001333 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  2696 00001335 0E                      		push	cs
  2697 00001336 E84000                  		call	command
  2698 00001339 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  2699                                  doc1:					
  2700 0000133B 0E                      		push	cs
  2701 0000133C E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  2702 0000133F 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  2703 00001341 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  2704 00001344 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  2705 00001347 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  2706 00001348 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  2707                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  2708                                  
  2709                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  2710                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  2711                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  2712                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  2713                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  2714                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  2715                                  ;
  2716                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  2717                                  
  2718                                  rsct_loop:				
  2719 00001349 6D                      		insw
  2720 0000134A E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  2721 0000134C FB                      		sti
  2722                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2723 0000134D F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  2724                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  2725                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  2726 00001352 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  2727 00001354 0E                      		push	cs
  2728 00001355 E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  2729 00001358 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  2730 0000135A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  2731 0000135D BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  2732 00001360 FA                      		cli
  2733 00001361 F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  2734 00001363 FB                      		sti
  2735                                  doc2:					
  2736 00001364 0E                      		push	cs
  2737 00001365 E82900                  		call	check_status
  2738 00001368 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  2739                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  2740 0000136A FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  2741 0000136E 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  2742                                  doc3:					
  2743 00001370 C3                      		retn
  2744                                  
  2745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2746                                  
  2747                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  2748                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  2749                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  2750                                  
  2751                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2752                                  
  2753                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  2754                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  2755                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  2756                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  2757                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  2758                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  2759                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  2760                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  2761                                  
  2762                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  2763                                  ;
  2764                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  2765                                  ;
  2766                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  2767                                  ;
  2768                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  2769                                  ;
  2770                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  2771                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  2772                                  ;	
  2773                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  2774                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  2775                                  
  2776                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  2777                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2778                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  2779                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2780 00001371 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2781 00001374 EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  2782                                  
  2783                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2784                                  
  2785                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  2786                                  ;
  2787                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  2788                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  2789                                  ;
  2790                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2791                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  2792                                  ;
  2793                                  ;
  2794                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  2795                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2796                                  ;
  2797                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  2798                                  
  2799                                  command:	; proc near		
  2800                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2801                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  2802                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2803 00001379 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2804 0000137C EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  2805                                  
  2806                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2807                                  
  2808                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  2809                                  ;
  2810                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  2811                                  ;
  2812                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2813                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  2814                                  ;
  2815                                  ;
  2816                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  2817                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2818                                  ;		
  2819                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  2820                                  
  2821                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  2822                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2823                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  2824                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2825 00001381 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2826 00001384 EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  2827                                  
  2828                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2829                                  
  2830                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  2831                                  ;
  2832                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  2833                                  ;
  2834                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2835                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  2836                                  ;
  2837                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  2838                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2839                                  
  2840                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  2841                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2842                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  2843                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2844 00001389 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2845 0000138C EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  2846                                  
  2847                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2848                                  
  2849                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  2850                                  ;
  2851                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  2852                                  ;
  2853                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2854                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  2855                                  ;
  2856                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  2857                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2858                                  
  2859                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  2860                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2861                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  2862                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2863 00001391 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2864 00001394 EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  2865                                  
  2866                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2867                                  
  2868                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  2869                                  ;
  2870                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  2871                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  2872                                  ;
  2873                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  2874                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  2875                                  ;
  2876                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  2877                                  
  2878                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  2879                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2880                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  2881                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2882 00001399 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2883 0000139C EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  2884                                  
  2885                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2886                                  
  2887                                  endatrom:
  2888                                  
  2889                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2890                                  
  2891                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  2892                                  ;;
  2893                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  2894                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  2895                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  2896                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  2897                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  2898                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  2899                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  2900                                  
  2901                                  compaq_disk_io:
  2902 000013A1 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  2903                                  					;
  2904                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  2905                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  2906                                  					;
  2907                                  					; warning!!!
  2908                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  2909 000013A4 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  2910                                  no_hookit:				
  2911                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  2912                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2913 000013A6 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  2914                                  
  2915                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2916                                  
  2917                                  mebbe_hookit:
  2918 000013AB 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  2919 000013AE 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  2920 000013B0 1E                      		push	ds
  2921                                  		
  2922                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2923                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  2924                                  		;push	ax
  2925                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  2926                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  2927                                  		;pop	ax
  2928 000013B1 6A40                    		push	40h
  2929 000013B3 1F                      		pop	ds
  2930                                  
  2931 000013B4 9C                      		pushf
  2932                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  2933                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2934 000013B5 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  2935 000013BA 1F                      		pop	ds
  2936 000013BB CA0200                  		retf	2
  2937                                  
  2938                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2939                                  
  2940 000013BE 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  2941                                  
  2942                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2943                                  
  2944                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2945                                  %if 0  
  2946                                  
  2947                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  2948                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  2949                                  
  2950                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  2951                                  
  2952                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  2953                                  ;
  2954                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  2955                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  2956                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  2957                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  2958                                  
  2959                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  2960                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  2961                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  2962                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  2963                                  		jnb	short century20
  2964                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  2965                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  2966                                  		jmp	short years
  2967                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2968                                  		
  2969                                  century20:				
  2970                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  2971                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  2972                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  2973                                  					; adjust daycnt
  2974                                  years:					
  2975                                  		xor	dx, dx
  2976                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  2977                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  2978                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  2979                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  2980                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  2981                                  		mov	bl, 4
  2982                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  2983                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  2984                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  2985                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  2986                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  2987                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  2988                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  2989                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  2990                                  regularyear:				
  2991                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  2992                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  2993                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  2994                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  2995                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  2996                                  					;
  2997                                  					; should never fall through loop
  2998                                  leapyear:				
  2999                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3000                                  					; change month table.
  3001                                  yeardone:				
  3002                                  		xor	bx, bx
  3003                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3004                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3005                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3006                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3007                                  		mov	cx, 12
  3008                                  months:					
  3009                                  		inc	bl
  3010                                  
  3011                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3012                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3013                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3014                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3015                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3016                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3017                                  		
  3018                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3019                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3020                                  					; dh=0
  3021                                  		jbe	short month_done
  3022                                  		inc	si		; next month
  3023                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3024                                  		loop	months		;
  3025                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3026                                  month_done:				
  3027                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3028                                  					; restore month table value
  3029                                  		mov	dl, bl
  3030                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3031                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3032                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3033                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3034                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3035                                  		xchg	dl, al
  3036                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3037                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3038                                  		xchg	dh, al
  3039                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3040                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3041                                  		xchg	cl, al
  3042                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3043                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3044                                  		mov	ch, al
  3045                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3046                                  		retf
  3047                                  
  3048                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3049                                  
  3050                                  %endif
  3051                                  
  3052                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3053                                  
  3054                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3055                                  %if 0  
  3056                                  
  3057                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3058                                  
  3059                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3060                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3061                                  		
  3062                                  		push	cx		
  3063                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  3064                                  		mov	cl, 4
  3065                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3066                                  		or	al, ah
  3067                                  		pop	cx
  3068                                  		retf
  3069                                  %endif
  3070                                  
  3071                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3072                                  
  3073                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3074                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3075                                  
  3076                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3077                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3078                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3079                                  
  3080                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3081                                  
  3082                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3083                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  3084                                  int_6Ch:
  3085 000013BF 0E                      		push	cs
  3086 000013C0 1F                      		pop	ds
  3087                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  3088 000013C1 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  3089 000013C6 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  3090 000013C8 BB[8707]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  3091 000013CB FFD3                    		call    bx
  3092                                  int6c:					
  3093                                  		;push	cs
  3094                                  		;pop	ds
  3095 000013CD 8F06[AA06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3096 000013D1 8F06[AC06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3097 000013D5 9D                      		popf
  3098 000013D6 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3099 000013D9 FA                      		cli
  3100 000013DA 8936[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3101 000013DE FB                      		sti

  3115                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3116                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si

  3118                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3119 000013EC 50                      		push	ax
  3120 000013ED 51                      		push	cx
  3121 000013EE 52                      		push	dx
  3122 000013EF 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3123 000013F1 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3124                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3125                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3126                                  					; midnight
  3127                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  3128 000013F3 5A                      		pop	dx
  3129 000013F4 59                      		pop	cx
  3130 000013F5 58                      		pop	ax

  3132 000013F7 53                      		push	bx
  3133 000013F8 51                      		push	cx
  3134 000013F9 52                      		push	dx
  3135                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1

  3139                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  3140 00001400 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  3141 00001402 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)

  3174 0000143C 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no

  3260                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================

  3262                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  3263                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  3264                                  
  3265                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  3266 0000149D B402                    		mov	ah, 2

  3268                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  3269                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD

  3297                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin

  3299                                  in_bin:		; proc near

  3312 000014FA C3                      		retn
  3313                                  
  3314                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3315                                  
  3316                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  3317                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  3318                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  3319                                  
  3320                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  3321 000014FB 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  3322 000014FD 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  3323 000014FF B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3324 00001501 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  3325 00001503 D50A                    		aad
  3326 00001505 C3                      		retn
  3327                                  
  3328                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3329                                  
  3330                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  3331                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  3332                                  
  3333                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  3334 00001506 803E[AE06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  3335 0000150B 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  3336 0000150D 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  3337 0000150F 803E[AE06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  3338                                  		;jb	short date_error
  3339                                  		; 12/12/2022

  3342                                  		;jb	short date_error

  3349 00001529 7714                    		ja	short date_error

  3351                                  		;jbe	short date_error

  3354 00001537 7706                    		ja	short date_error

  3356                                  		;;jbe	short date_error

  3361                                  		; 12/12/2022

  3399                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3400                                  
  3401                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  3402                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  3403                                  
  3404                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  3405 00001556 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  3406 00001559 BB[AE06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  3407                                  bv_loop:
  3408 0000155C 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  3409 0000155E 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  3410 00001560 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  3411                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  3412 00001563 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  3413 00001565 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  3414 00001567 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3415 00001569 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3416 0000156B D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3417 0000156D D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3418 0000156F 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  3419 00001572 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  3420 00001575 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  3421 00001577 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  3422 00001578 49                      		dec	cx
  3423 00001579 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  3424 0000157B F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  3425 0000157C C3                      		retn
  3426                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3427                                  
  3428                                  		; 12/12/2022
  3429                                  ;bv_error:
  3430                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  3431                                  		;retn
  3432                                  
  3433                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  3439                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3440                                  ;									:
  3441                                  ;	System initialization						:
  3442                                  ;									:
  3443                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  3444                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  3445                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  3446                                  ;									:
  3447                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  3448                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  3449                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  3450                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  3451                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  3452                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  3453                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  3454                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  3455                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  3456                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  3457                                  ;		this program.						:
  3458                                  ;									:
  3459                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3460                                  
  3461                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3462                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  3463                                  
  3464                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  3465                                  
  3466 0000157D 90                      align 2
  3467                                  		;db 90h
  3468                                  
  3469                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 combined/single kernel file)
  3470                                  ; ((no need to read/load 'MSDOS.SYS', it is already loaded))
  3471                                  ; (((bios_l,bios_h,doscnt,fatloc,md_sectorsize,temp_cluster,last_fat_sec_num
  3472                                  ;   would be used to read 'MSDOS.SYS' from disk, now they are not needed)))
  3473                                  	
  3474 0000157E 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  3475                                  ;bios_l:	dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  3476                                  ;bios_h:	dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  3477                                  ;doscnt:	dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  3478 00001580 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  3479                                  ;fatloc:	dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  3480 00001581 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  3481 00001583 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  3482                                  ;md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3483                                  ;temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3484                                  ;last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3485                                  
  3486                                  ; the following two bytes are used to save the info returned by int 13, ah = 8
  3487                                  ; call to determine drive parameters.
  3488                                  
  3489 00001584 02                      num_heads:	db 2			; number of heads returned by rom
  3490                                  		;db 0	; 08/08/2023
  3491 00001585 09                      sec_trk:	db 9			; sec/trk returned by rom
  3492 00001586 28                      num_cyln:	db 40			; number of cylinders returned by rom
  3493                                  		;db 0	; 08/08/2023
  3494 00001587 00                      fakefloppydrv:	db 0			; if 1,	then no	diskette drives	in the system.
  3495                                  
  3496                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3497                                  
  3498 00001588 0002000140000000        disktable:	dw 512,	0100h, 64, 0	; warning !!! old values
  3499 00001590 0008010270000000        		dw 2048, 0201h, 112, 0
  3500 00001598 0020020400010000        		dw 8192, 0402h, 256, 0
  3501 000015A0 A87F030800020000        		dw 32680, 0803h, 512, 0	; warning !!! old values
  3502 000015A8 FFFF041000040000        		dw 65535, 1004h, 1024, 0
  3503                                  					; default disktable under
  3504                                  					; the assumption of total fat size <= 128 kb,
  3505                                  					; and the maximum size of fat entry = 16 bit.
  3506                                  		; 08/08/2023

  3592                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)

  3721                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  3722                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  3723                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  3724                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  3725                                  ;
  3726                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  3727                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  3728                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  3729                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  3730                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  3731                                  ;	  and a retf
  3732                                  
  3733                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3734                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  3735                                  ; 09/12/2022
  3736                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  3737                                  
  3738                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  3739                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  3740 00001609 [CA00]                  		dw BC_RETF
  3741                                  
  3742                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3743                                  
  3744                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  3745 0000160B 2EFF36[0916]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  3746                                  					; set up near return to far return
  3747 00001610 2EFF36[B606]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  3748 00001615 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  3749 00001616 CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  3750                                  
  3751                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3752                                  		
  3753                                  		; 20/12/2022

  3758                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0, classic/old MICROSOFT DOS method)
  3759                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (combined kernel files, original/new method) (*)
  3760                                  ;      (*) (for using Retro DOS kernel 'MSDOS.SYS' with Retro DOS boot sector)

  3766                                  init:		; 27/12/2018
  3767                                  		; MSDOS 6.0 (MSINIT.ASM)
  3768                                  		;=============================================================
  3769                                  		;
  3770                                  		; entry from boot sector. the register contents are:
  3771                                  		;
  3772                                  		;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
  3773                                  		;   ch = media byte
  3774                                  		;   bx = first data sector on disk.
  3775                                  		;   ax = first data sector (high)
  3776                                  		;   di = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  3777                                  
  3778                                  		; 07/04/2018
  3779                                  		;=============================================================
  3780                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 - registers from FD Boot Sector 
  3781                                                  ; DL = [bsDriveNumber]
  3782                                  		; DH = [bsMedia]
  3783                                  		; AX = [bsSectors] ; Total sectors
  3784                                  		; DS = 0, SS = 0
  3785                                  		; BP = 7C00h
  3786                                  
  3787                                  		; 29/09/2023
  3788                                  		; SP = 0FFFEh (for Retro DOS v2&v3 boot sector) 
  3789                                  		;    = 07C00h (for MSDOS 5.0 boot sector)
  3790                                  		
  3791                                  ; 20/12/2022
  3792                                  ; Changing original MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS init code with Retro DOS v4.0 init code.		
  3793                                  %if 0	
  3794                                  		cli
  3795                                  
  3796                                  		push	ax
  3797                                  		xor	ax, ax
  3798                                  		mov	ds, ax
  3799                                  		pop	ax
  3800                                  %endif
  3801                                  
  3802                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (combined kernel)
  3803                                  
  3804                                  KERNEL_SEGMENT equ 70h	; (DOS BIOSDATA SEGMENT)
  3805                                  BSSECPERTRACK equ 18h	; boot sector offset 18h (for Retro DOS & MSDOS)

  3902 00001644 B378                    		mov	bl, 1Eh*4

  3904                                  
  3905                                  		; check if the table is already at 0:SEC9 (0:0522h)
  3906                                   		; (do not move the DPT if is not original ROMBIOS table)
  3907

  3917 00001646 C537                    		lds	si, [bx]

  3924 0000164E 8ED9                    		mov	ds, cx ; 0

  3926 00001652 894F02                  		mov	[bx+2], cx ; 0  ; [007Ah] ; 1Eh*4+2 ; segment

  3965                                  ;									:
  3966                                  ;	System initialization						:
  3967                                  ;									:
  3968                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  3969                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  3970                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  3971                                  ;									:
  3972                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  3973                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  3974                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  3975                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  3976                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  3977                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  3978                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  3979                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  3980                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  3981                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  3982                                  ;		this program.						:
  3983                                  ;									:
  3984                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3985                                  		
  3986                                  		; 20/12/2022
  3987                                  		; ----------------------
  3988                                  		; Registers
  3989                                  		; ----------------------
  3990                                  		; DL = [bsDriveNumber]
  3991                                  		; DH = [bsMedia]
  3992                                  		; DS = 0, ES = 0, SS = 0
  3993                                  		; BP = 7C00h
  3994                                  		; SP = 700h
  3995                                  		; ----------------------
  3996                                  		; CX = 0				
  3997                                  
  3998                                  ; 02/10/2022 - 20/12/2022
  3999                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4000                                  ; Note: Retro DOS v4.0 Kernel does not use/contain MSLOAD part of IO.SYS (5.0)
  4001                                  ; 	Because, Retro DOS v2 boot sector loads complete/entire MSDOS.SYS
  4002                                  ;	(RETRODOS.SYS) Kernel file (IO.SYS & MSDOS.SYS together).
  4003                                  ;	As result of boot sector ve init differences, Retro DOS init code (here)
  4004                                  ;	moves kernel to segment 70h at first, then sets diskette parameters
  4005                                  ;	at segment 50h (while MSDOS 5.0 boot sector and then MSLOAD sets this).
  4006                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4007                                  
  4008                                  ; msload will check the extended boot record and set ax, bx accordingly.
  4009                                  ;
  4010                                  ;;	msload passes a 32 bit sector number hi word in ax and low in bx
  4011                                  ;;	save this in cs:bios_h and cs:bios_l. this is for the start of
  4012                                  ;;	data sector of the bios.
  4013                                  ;
  4014                                  ;		mov	[cs:bios_h], ax	; (start of) dos bios (IO.SYS) data sector
  4015                                  ;		mov	[cs:bios_l], bx
  4016                                  
  4017                                  ; with the following information from msload, we don't need the
  4018                                  ;     boot sector any more.-> this will solve the problem of 29 kb size
  4019                                  ;     limitation of msbio.com file.

  4101                                  					; ;
  4102 0000169A FB                      		sti
  4103 0000169B CD11                    		int	11h		; EQUIPMENT DETERMINATION
  4104                                  					; Return: AX = equipment flag bits
  4105                                  
  4106                                  ; we have to support a system that does not have any diskette
  4107                                  ; drives but only hardfiles. this system will ipl from the hardfile.
  4108                                  ; if the equipment flag bit 0 is 1, then the system has diskette drive(s).
  4109                                  ; otherwise, the system has only hardfiles.
  4110                                  ;
  4111                                  ; important thing is that still, for compatibility reason, the drive letter
  4112                                  ; for the hardfiles start from "c".  so, we still need to allocate dummy bds
  4113                                  ; drive a and drive b. at sysinit time, we are going to set cds table entry
  4114                                  ; of dpb pointer for these drives to 0, so any user attempt to access this
  4115                                  ; drives will get "invalid drive letter ..." message. we are going to
  4116                                  ; establish "fakefloppydrv" flag. ***sysinit module should call int 11h to
  4117                                  ; determine whether there are any diskette drivers in the system or not.!!!***
  4118                                  
  4119                                  ; check the register returned by the equipment determination interrupt
  4120                                  ; we have to handle the case of no diskettes in the system by faking
  4121                                  ; two dummy drives.
  4122                                  ;
  4123                                  ; if the register indicates that we do have floppy drives we don't need
  4124                                  ; to do anything special.
  4125                                  ;
  4126                                  ; if the register indicates that we don't have any floppy drives then
  4127                                  ; what we need to do is set the fakefloppydrv variable, change the
  4128                                  ; register to say that we do have floppy drives and then go to execute
  4129                                  ; the code which starts at notsingle. this is because we can skip the
  4130                                  ; code given below which tries to find if there are one or two drives
  4131                                  ; since we already know about this.
  4132                                  
  4133                                  		; 06/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4134 0000169D 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  4135                                  
  4136                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4137 0000169F A801                    		test	al, 1
  4138                                  		;test	ax, 1		; floppy drives	present	?
  4139 000016A1 751E                    		jnz	short normalfloppydrv ;	yes.
  4140                                  
  4141                                  ; Some ROM BIOSs lie that there are no floppy drives. Lets find out
  4142                                  ; whether it is an old ROM BIOS or a new one
  4143                                  ;
  4144                                  ; WARNING !!!
  4145                                  ;
  4146                                  ; This sequence of code is present in SYSINIT1.ASM also. Any modification
  4147                                  ; here will require an equivalent modification in SYSINIT1.ASM also
  4148                                  
  4149                                  		; 20/12/2022

  4151                                  		;push	bx

  4154                                  		;push	di

  4157 000016A7 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  4158 000016A9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4159                                  					; DL = drive number
  4160                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  4161                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  4162                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  4163 000016AB 7202                    		jc	short _gdskp_error
  4164                                  		;;mov	[cs:flp_drvs], dl
  4165                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4166                                  		; ds = cs
  4167                                  		;mov	[flp_drvs], dl

  4179                                  					; if error it is an old ROM BIOS
  4180                                  					; so, lets assume that ROM BIOS lied
  4181                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4182                                  		; ds = cs
  4183                                  		;cmp	byte [flp_drvs], 0
  4184                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:flp_drvs], 0 ; number of drvs == 0?

  4250                                  INITSPOT EQU	534h	; IBM wants 4 zeros here
  4251                                  BRKADR	 EQU	1BH * 4	; 6CH, 1BH break vector address
  4252                                  TIMADR	EQU	1CH * 4	; 70H, 1CH timer interrupt
  4253                                  DSKADR	EQU	1EH * 4	; address of ptr to disk parameters
  4254                                  SEC9	EQU	522h	; address of disk parameters
  4255                                  CHROUT	EQU	29h
  4256                                  LSTDRV	EQU     504h

  4308                                  ; let model_byte, secondary_model_byte be set here!!!
  4309                                  
  4310 000016DF B4C0                    		mov	ah, 0C0h
  4311 000016E1 CD15                    		int	15h	; SYSTEM - GET CONFIGURATION (XT after 1/10/86,AT mdl 3x9,CONV,XT286,PS)
  4312 000016E3 7215                    		jb	short no_rom_system_conf ; just	use Model_Byte
  4313 000016E5 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0
  4314 000016E8 7510                    		jnz	short no_rom_system_conf
  4315                                  
  4316                                  ;		; 20/12/2022
  4317                                  ;		; (Programmer's Guide to the AMIBIOS, page 268)
  4318                                  ;		; (https://stanislavs.org/helppc/int_15-c0.html)
  4319                                  ;
  4320                                  ;		INT 15h, ah = C0h - Return System Configuration Parameters (PS/2 only)
  4321                                  ;
  4322                                  ;		on return:
  4323                                  ;		CF = 0 if successful
  4324                                  ;		   = 1 if error
  4325                                  ;		AH = when CF set, 80h for PC & PCjr, 86h for XT
  4326                                  ;	     	    (BIOS after 11/8/82) and AT (BIOS after 1/10/84)
  4327                                  ;
  4328                                  ;		ES:BX = pointer to system descriptor table in ROM of the format:
  4329                                  ;
  4330                                  ;		Offset Size	     Description
  4331                                  ;
  4332                                  ;		  00   word   length of descriptor (8 minimum)
  4333                                  ;		  02   byte   model byte (same as F000:FFFE, not reliable)
  4334                                  ;		  03   byte   secondary model byte
  4335                                  ;		  04   byte   BIOS revision level (zero based)
  4336                                  ;		  05   byte   feature information, see below
  4337                                  ;		  06   dword  reserved
  4338                                  
  4339                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4340                                  		; ds = cs
  4341 000016EA 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+ROMBIOS_DESC.bios_sd_modelbyte]
  4342 000016EE A2[2D06]                		mov	[model_byte], al
  4343                                  		;mov	[cs:model_byte], al
  4344                                  					; get/save model byte
  4345 000016F1 268A4703                		mov	al, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+ROMBIOS_DESC.bios_sd_scnd_modelbyte]
  4346 000016F5 A2[2E06]                		mov	[secondary_model_byte], al
  4347                                  		;mov	[cs:secondary_model_byte], al
  4348                                  					; get/save secondary model byte
  4349 000016F8 EB0C                    		jmp	short turn_timer_on

  4357 00001703 A2[2D06]                		mov	[model_byte], al

  4360 00001706 B020                    		mov	al, 20h	; ' '   ; turn on the timer
  4361 00001708 E620                    		out	20h, al		; Interrupt controller,	8259A.
  4362                                  					; AKPORT

  4364                                  ; some olivetti m24 machines have an 8530 serial communications
  4365                                  ; chip installed at io address 50h and 52h. if we're running
  4366                                  ; on one of those, we must inhibit the normal aux port initialization
  4367

  4369                                  		; ds = cs
  4370 0000170A 803E[2D06]00            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0
  4371                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0 ; next to last	byte in	rom bios
  4372 0000170F 7510                    		jnz	short not_olivetti_m24 ; skip for all other machines
  4373                                  					; (except olivetti m24)
  4374 00001711 E466                    		in	al, 66h		; is 8530 installed?
  4375 00001713 A820                    		test	al, 20h
  4376 00001715 740A                    		jz	short not_olivetti_m24 ; we're done if not
  4377 00001717 B00F                    		mov	al, 0Fh		; double check
  4378 00001719 E650                    		out	50h, al
  4379 0000171B E450                    		in	al, 50h
  4380 0000171D A801                    		test	al, 1		; this test was	copied from olivetti
  4381 0000171F 7414                    		jz	short skip_aux_port_init ; take	this branch if 8530 installed
  4382

  4384 00001721 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; init com4
  4385 00001723 E82208                  		call	aux_init

  4394 00001735 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; init lpt3

  4441                                  ;		; 20/12/2022

  4443                                  ;		Address Size	   Description	 (BIOS/DOS Data Area)
  4444                                  ;	
  4445                                  ;		50:00	byte	Print screen status byte
  4446                                  ;				 00 = PrtSc not active,
  4447                                  ;				 01 = PrtSc in progress
  4448                                  ;				 FF = error
  4449                                  ;		50:01  3 bytes	Used by BASIC
  4450                                  ;		50:04	byte	DOS single diskette mode flag, 0=A:, 1=B:
  4451                                  ;		50:05  10bytes	POST work area
  4452                                  ;		50:0F	byte	BASIC shell flag; set to 2 if current shell
  4453                                  ;		50:10	word	BASICs default DS value (DEF SEG)
  4454                                  ;		50:12	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 1C interrupt handler
  4455                                  ;		50:16	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 23 interrupt handler
  4456                                  ;		50:1A	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 24 disk error handler
  4457                                  ;		50:20	word	DOS dynamic storage
  4458                                  ;		50:22  14bytes	DOS diskette initialization table (INT 1E)
  4459                                  ;		50:30	4bytes	MODE command
  4460                                  ;		70:00		I/O drivers from IO.SYS/IBMBIO.COM
