  7306                                  
  7307                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7308                                  
  7309                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7310                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7311                                  
  7312                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7313                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7314                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7315                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7316                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7317                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7318                                  ;
  7319                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7320                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7321                                  
  7322                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7323 00001F88 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7324                                  fmpnext:				
  7325 00001F8C 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7326 00001F90 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7327 00001F92 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7328 00001F95 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7329 00001F99 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7330                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7331                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7332                                  fmpnextfound:
  7333 00001F9B C3                      		retn
  7334                                  
  7335                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7336                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7337                                  ;fmpret:
  7338                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7339                                  
  7340                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7341                                  
  7342                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7343                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.
  7344 00001F9C E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7345 00001F9F 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7346 00001FA1 8B3E[FA15]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  7347 00001FA5 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7348                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7349 00001FAA 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7350                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7351                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7352 00001FAE C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7353                                  					; ffHardFile
  7354 00001FB2 C606[8015]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7355 00001FB7 A1[FC15]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7356 00001FBA 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7357 00001FBD A1[FE15]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7358 00001FC0 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7359 00001FC3 A0[F615]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7360 00001FC6 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7361                                  					; set physical number
  7362 00001FC9 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7363 00001FCC 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7364                                  					; set logical number
  7365 00001FCF 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7366 00001FD4 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7367 00001FD6 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7368                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7369 00001FDB 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7370                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7371                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7372 00001FDD 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7373 00001FE0 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7374 00001FE4 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7375 00001FE7 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7376 00001FE9 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7377 00001FEB 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7378 00001FEF 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7379                                  					; set hidden trks
  7380 00001FF2 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7381 00001FF6 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7382 00001FFA 8A16[F615]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7383 00001FFE BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7384 00002001 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7385 00002004 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7386                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7387                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7388                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7389 00002006 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  7390 00002008 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7391                                  
  7392                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7393                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7394 0000200B 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7395 00002011 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7396                                  
  7397                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7398                                  		;push	es
  7399 00002013 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7400                                  					; bx value saved.
  7401                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7402 00002016 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7403 00002018 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7404                                  fmpnextchain:
  7405 0000201B E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7406                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7408                                  
  7409                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7410                                  ;fmpnextfound:
  7411                                  		;retn
  7412                                  
  7413                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7414                                  
  7415                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7416                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7417                                  
  7418                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7419                                  	
  7420 0000201E 57                      		push	di
  7421 0000201F 53                      		push	bx
  7422                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7423                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7424                                  		;push	ds
  7425 00002020 06                      		push	es
  7426                                  setmini_1:				
  7427 00002021 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7428 00002025 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7429 00002027 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7430 0000202B 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7431 0000202D 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7432 00002031 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7433 00002033 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7434 00002036 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7435 0000203A 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7436 0000203C F9                      		stc
  7437 0000203D 07                      		pop	es
  7438                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7439                                  		;pop	ds
  7440 0000203E 5B                      		pop	bx
  7441 0000203F 5F                      		pop	di
  7442 00002040 C3                      		retn
  7443                                  
  7444                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7445                                  setmini_2:
  7446 00002041 E986FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7447                                  
  7448                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7449                                  
  7450                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7451                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7452                                  ;
  7453                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7454                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7455                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7456                                  ;
  7457                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7458                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7459                                  ;			trash ax
  7460                                  
  7461                                  dmax_check:
  7462 00002044 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7463 00002049 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; returns with carry if okay
  7464 0000204B 06                      		push	es
  7465                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7466 0000204C B82704                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7467 0000204F 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7468                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7469 00002051 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7470                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7471                                  					; set message flag
  7472                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7473 00002057 07                      		pop	es
  7474                                  
  7475                                  		;;push	es
  7476                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7477                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7478                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7479                                  					; set message flag
  7480                                  		;;pop	es
  7481                                  		;
  7482                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7483                                  dmax_ok:
  7484 00002058 C3                      		retn
  7485                                  
  7486                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7487                                  
  7488                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7489                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7490                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7491                                  ;								 
  7492                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7493                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7494                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7495                                  
  7496                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7497 00002059 56                      		push	si
  7498 0000205A 53                      		push	bx
  7499 0000205B 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7500                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7501 0000205F 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7502 00002062 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ; skip ahead if so
  7503                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7504 00002064 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7505 00002066 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7506                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7507                                  
  7508                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7509                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7510 00002068 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7511                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7512 0000206A 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7513                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7514 0000206D C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7515                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7516 00002071 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7517                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7518                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7519 00002074 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7520 00002077 8B36[F815]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7521 0000207B 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7522 0000207D 8306[F815]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7523 00002082 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7524 00002086 8306[FA15]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7525 0000208B 5B                      		pop	bx
  7526 0000208C 5E                      		pop	si
  7527 0000208D C3                      		retn
  7528                                  
  7529                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7530                                  
  7531                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7532                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7533                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7534                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7535                                  
  7536                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7537                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7538 0000208E 50                      		push	ax
  7539 0000208F 51                      		push	cx
  7540 00002090 52                      		push	dx
  7541 00002091 55                      		push	bp
  7542 00002092 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7543                                  loop_clock:
  7544 00002094 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7545 00002096 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7546 00002098 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7547 0000209A CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7548                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7549                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7550                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7551 0000209C 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7552 0000209F 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7553 000020A1 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7554 000020A4 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7555 000020A6 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7556 000020A9 741B                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7557 000020AB 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7558 000020AC B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7559                                  delay:
  7560 000020AF E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7561 000020B1 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7562                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7563                                  
  7564                                  clock_present:
  7565                                  		;mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7566                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7567                                  		; ds = cs
  7568 000020B3 C606[EC04]01            		mov	byte [havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7569                                  		
  7570 000020B8 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7571                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7572                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7573 000020BB 56                      		push	si
  7574 000020BC E82DF3                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7575 000020BF FA                      		cli
  7576                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7577 000020C0 8936[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7578 000020C4 FB                      		sti
  7579 000020C5 5E                      		pop	si
  7580                                  no_readdate:
  7581 000020C6 5D                      		pop	bp
  7582 000020C7 5A                      		pop	dx
  7583 000020C8 59                      		pop	cx
  7584 000020C9 58                      		pop	ax
  7585                                  cmosck9:	; 19/12/2023
  7586 000020CA C3                      		retn
  7587                                  
  7588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7589                                  
  7590                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7591                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7592                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7593                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7594                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7595                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7596                                  ;
  7597                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7598                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7599                                  ;
  7600                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7601                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7602                                  ;
  7603                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7604                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7605                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initialization routine
  7606                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7607                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7608                                  ;
  7609                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7610                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7611                                  
  7612                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits
  7613                                  
  7614                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7615                                  
  7616                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7617                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7618                                  
  7619                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7620                                  		; ds = cs
  7621                                  		;push	ax ; not necessary ; 19/12/2023
  7622                                  		;
  7623 000020CB 803E[2D06]FC            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0FCh
  7624                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7625 000020D0 75F8                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7626 000020D2 803E[2E06]06            		cmp	byte [secondary_model_byte], 6 ; 21/04/2024
  7627                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7628                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7629 000020D7 7407                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
  7630 000020D9 803E[2E06]04            		cmp	byte [secondary_model_byte], 4
  7631                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7632                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7633 000020DE 73EA                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
  7634                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
  7635                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7636                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
  7637                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
  7638                                  cmosck4:
  7639 000020E0 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7640                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7641 000020E2 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7642                                  					; Set divider & rate selection
  7643 000020E4 E80B00                  		call	cmos_write
  7644 000020E7 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7645                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7646 000020E9 E82000                  		call	cmos_read
  7647 000020EC 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7648                                  					; clear SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7649 000020EE 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7650 000020F0 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7651                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7652                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7653                                  		;call	cmos_write
  7654                                  ;cmosck9:
  7655                                  		;pop	ax ; 19/12/2023
  7656                                  		;retn
  7657                                  
  7658                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7659                                  		;jmp	short cmos_write
  7660                                  
  7661                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7662                                  
  7663                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7664                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7665                                  ;									       :
  7666                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7667                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7668                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7669                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7670                                  ;									       :
  7671                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7672                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7673                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7674                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7675                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7676                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7677                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7678                                  
  7679                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)
  7680 000020F2 9C                      		pushf			;
  7681 000020F3 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7682 000020F4 FA                      		cli
  7683 000020F5 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7684 000020F6 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7685 000020F8 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7686                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7687 000020FA 90                      		nop
  7688 000020FB 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7689 000020FD E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7690 000020FF 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7691 00002100 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7692 00002102 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7693 00002104 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7694                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7695 00002106 90                      		nop
  7696 00002107 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7697 00002109 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7698                                  
  7699                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7700                                  		;push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7701                                  		;call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7702                                  		;retn
  7703 0000210A EB18                    		jmp	short cmos_rw_popf
  7704                                  
  7705                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7706                                  
  7707                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7708                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7709                                  ;									       :
  7710                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7711                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7712                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7713                                  ;									       :
  7714                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7715                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled. during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7716                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7717                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7718                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7719                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7720                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7721                                  
  7722                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)
  7723 0000210C 9C                      		pushf
  7724 0000210D FA                      		cli
  7725 0000210E 53                      		push	bx
  7726                                  		;push	ax ; *		; AL = cmos table address to be read
  7727                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7728 0000210F 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax ; * ; input
  7729 00002111 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7730 00002113 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7731                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7732 00002115 90                      		nop			; (undocumented delay needed)
  7733 00002116 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7734                                  		
  7735                                  		;mov	bx, ax ; output
  7736                                  		;pop	ax ; * ; input
  7737                                  
  7738                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7739                                  		; al = output, bl = input
  7740 00002118 93                      		xchg	ax, bx ; *
  7741                                  		; bl = output, al = input
  7742                                  	
  7743 00002119 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7744 0000211B 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7745 0000211D E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7746                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7747 0000211F 90                      		nop
  7748 00002120 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7749                                  		;mov	ax, bx ; * ; output
  7750                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7751 00002122 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  7752 00002123 5B                      		pop	bx
  7753                                  
  7754                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7755                                  cmos_rw_popf:
  7756 00002124 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7757 00002125 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7758 00002128 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7759                                  
  7760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7761                                  
  7762                                  cmos_popf:				
  7763 00002129 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7764                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7765                                  
  7766                                  ; 21/12/2022
  7767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7769                                  %if 0
  7770                                  
  7771                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7772                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7773                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7774                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7775                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7776                                  
  7777                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7778                                  ;
  7779                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7780                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7781                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7782                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7783                                  
  7784                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7785                                  
  7786                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7787                                  ;
  7788                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7789                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7790                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7791                                  
  7792                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7793                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7794                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7795                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7796                                  
  7797                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7798                                  getclus:
  7799                                  		; 14/12/2023
  7800                                  		; 13/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS)
  7801                                  		; ds = cs
  7802                                  
  7803                                  		push	cx
  7804                                  		push	di
  7805                                  		;mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7806                                  		mov	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023
  7807                                  		mov	ax, bx
  7808                                  		dec	ax
  7809                                  		dec	ax
  7810                                  		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7811                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7812                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7813                                  		;add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7814                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7815                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7816                                  		add	ax, [bios_l]
  7817                                  		adc	dx, [bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7818                                  unpack:
  7819                                  		push	ds ; ds = cs ; 13/12/2023
  7820                                  		push	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  7821                                  		push	ax
  7822                                  		push	bx
  7823                                  		;mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7824                                  		mov	si, [fatloc] ; 13/12/2023
  7825                                  		mov	ds, si
  7826                                  		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7827                                  		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7828                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7829                                  		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7830                                  		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7831                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7832                                  		add	si, bx		;
  7833                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7834                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  7835                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7836                                  		; 12/12/2023
  7837                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  7838                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7839                                  		;pop	dx ; 12/12/2023
  7840                                  
  7841                                  		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7842                                  		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7843                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7844                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7845                                  
  7846                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7847                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7848                                  		push	ax ; **	; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  7849                                  
  7850                                  		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7851                                  
  7852                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  7853                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7854                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7855                                  		;pop	dx ; 13/12/2023
  7856                                  
  7857                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7858                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7859                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  7860                                  		;mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7861                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7862                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7863                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7864                                  		;mov	al, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7865                                  		pop	ax  ; ** ; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  7866                                  		mov	ah, [0] ; high 4 bits (bits 7 to 11) of 12 bits cluster num
  7867                                  even_odd:
  7868                                  		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7869                                  		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7870                                  		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7871                                  		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7872                                  		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7873                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7874                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7875                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7876                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7877                                  havclus:
  7878                                  		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7879                                  		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7880                                  		jmp	short unpackx
  7881                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7882                                  
  7883                                  unpack16:
  7884                                  		;push	dx	; 13/12/2023	
  7885                                  		xor	dx, dx ; 0
  7886                                  		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7887                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  7888                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7889                                  		rcl	dx, 1
  7890                                  
  7891                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7892                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  7893                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7894                                  		;pop	dx	; 13/12/2023
  7895                                  		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7896                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7897                                  unpackx:
  7898                                  		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7899                                  		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7900                                  		pop	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  7901                                  		pop	ds
  7902                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7903                                  		; (this is a fast kernel loading method by the MSDOS programmer)
  7904                                  		; ((consequtive clusters --> consequtive sectors))
  7905                                  		; ds = cs
  7906                                  		sub	si, bx
  7907                                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart? (consequtive?)
  7908                                  					; (current = previous+1)
  7909                                  		jnz	short getcl2	; no, read [doscnt] sectors 
  7910                                  		;add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7911                                  		add	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023 ; add to read count
  7912                                  		jmp	short unpack
  7913                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7914                                  
  7915                                  getcl2:
  7916                                  		push	bx
  7917                                  		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7918                                  		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7919                                  
  7920                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7921                                  		; ds = cs
  7922                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7923                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7924                                  		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7925                                  		mov	cx, [doscnt]
  7926                                  
  7927                                  		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7928                                  		;pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7929                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7930                                  		pop	word [start_sec_h]
  7931                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7932                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7933                                  		; ds = cs
  7934                                  		;push	ds
  7935                                  		;push	cs
  7936                                  		;pop	ds
  7937                                  
  7938                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7939                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7940                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7941                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7942                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7943                                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7944                                  		
  7945                                  		;pop	ds
  7946                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7947                                  		; ds = cs
  7948                                  		pop	bx
  7949                                  		pop	di
  7950                                  
  7951                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7952                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7953                                  		mov	ax, [doscnt]
  7954                                  		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7955                                  		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7956                                  		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7957                                  		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7958                                  		retn
  7959                                  
  7960                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7961                                  
  7962                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7963                                  ;
  7964                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7965                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7966                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7967                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7968                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7969                                  ;
  7970                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7971                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7972                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7973                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7974                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7975                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7976                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7977                                  
  7978                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7979                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7980                                  		; 14/12/2023
  7981                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7982                                  		; ds = fat buffer segment
  7983                                  
  7984                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7985                                  		;push	ax ; (not necessary)
  7986                                  		push	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  7987                                  		push	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  7988                                  		push	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  7989                                  		push	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  7990                                  		push	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  7991                                  
  7992                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7993                                  		push	cs
  7994                                  		pop	ds
  7995                                  
  7996                                  		mov	ax, si
  7997                                  		;;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7998                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7999                                  		;mov	cx, [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8000                                  		;div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8001                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8002                                  		;nop
  8003                                  
  8004                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8005                                  		div	word [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8006                                  
  8007                                  		; ax = FAT sector (sequence/index) number
  8008                                  		; dx = cluster number offset
  8009                                  
  8010                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8011                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8012                                  
  8013                                  		; 13/12/2023 ; *
  8014                                  		;push	es ; *
  8015                                  		;push	ds ; *
  8016                                  		;push	di ; *
  8017                                  		push	ax
  8018                                  		;push	cs ; *
  8019                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8020                                  
  8021                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8022                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8023                                  		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id 
  8024                                  		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8025                                  		;;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8026                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8027                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8028                                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8029                                  		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8030                                  		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8031                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8032                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8033                                  		;pop	di ; *
  8034                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8035                                  		;pop	es ; *
  8036                                  
  8037                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8038                                  		; ds = cs
  8039                                  		cmp	ax, [last_fat_sec_num]
  8040                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8041                                  		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8042                                  		mov	[last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8043                                  		;mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8044                                  					; sector number
  8045                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8046                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8047                                  		pop	es ; FAT buffer segment (DS on top of the stack)
  8048                                  		push	es ; (put it on top of the stack again)
  8049                                  
  8050                                  		push	dx ; cluster number offset
  8051                                  
  8052                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8053                                  		xor	cx, cx
  8054                                  		mov	[start_sec_h], cx ;0 
  8055                                  		;mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8056                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8057                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8058                                  		mov	dx, ax
  8059                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8060                                  		inc	cx ; cx = 1
  8061                                  		;mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8062                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8063                                  		mov	ax, [drvfat]
  8064                                  		;push	ds
  8065                                  		;pop	es
  8066                                  
  8067                                  		xor	di, di	; 0	; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8068                                  		
  8069                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8070                                  		;push	ds
  8071                                  		;push	cs
  8072                                  		;pop	ds
  8073                                  		
  8074                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8075                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8076                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8077                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8078                                  		call	call_bios_code
  8079                                  
  8080                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8081                                  		;pop	ds
  8082                                  		; ds = cs = biosdata segment
  8083                                  
  8084                                  		pop	dx ; cluster number offset 
  8085                                  
  8086                                  gfs_split_chk:
  8087                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8088                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8089                                  		mov	cx, [md_sectorsize]
  8090                                  ;gfs_split_chk:
  8091                                  		dec	cx		; 511
  8092                                  		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8093                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8094                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8095                                  		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8096                                  		
  8097                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8098                                  		; bx = dx = cluster number offset in the FAT buffer
  8099                                  		pop	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8100                                  		pop	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8101                                  		pop	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8102                                  		pop	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8103                                  		pop	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8104                                  		;pop	ax
  8105                                  
  8106                                  		retn
  8107                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8108                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8109                                  
  8110                                  %endif

  8115                                  		;db 0
  8116                                  
  8117                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8118                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8119                                  
  8120                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8121 0000212A 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8122                                  %endif
  8123                                  
  8124                                  ;align 16
  8125                                  
  8126                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8127                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF equ $ - BData_start
  8128                                  ; 29/09/2023
  8129                                  ;IOSYSCODESEGOFF equ $-$$
  8130                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8131                                  
  8132                                  ; 28/09/2023
  8133                                  S1SIZE equ $-$$
  8134

  8136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8137                                  		;db 4 dup(0)

  8142                                  ;============================================================================
  8143                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8144                                  ;============================================================================
  8145                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8146                                  
  8147                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  8148                                  
  8149                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8150                                   
  8151                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8152                                  
  8153                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8154                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8155                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8156                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8157                                  
  8158                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8159 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8160 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8161                                  
  8162                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8163                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8164                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8165                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8166                                  
  8167                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8168                                  
  8169                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8170                                  
  8171                                  ;************************************************************************
  8172                                  ;*									*
  8173                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8174                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8175                                  ;*									*
  8176                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8177                                  ;*									*
  8178                                  ;************************************************************************
  8179                                  
  8180                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8181                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8182                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8183                                  
  8184                                  _seg_reinit:
  8185 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8186                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8187                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8188 00000037 BF[B606]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8189                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8190                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8191                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8192 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8193                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8194 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8195 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8196 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8197 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8198                                  
  8199                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8200                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8201                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8202                                  		
  8203                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8204 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8205                                  		
  8206 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8207                                  
  8208                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8209                                  
  8210                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8211                                  
  8212                                  ;************************************************************************
  8213                                  ;*									*
  8214                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8215                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8216                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8217                                  ;*									*
  8218                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8219                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8220                                  ;*									*
  8221                                  ;************************************************************************
  8222                                  
  8223                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8224 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8225 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8226 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8227 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8228 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8229 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8230 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8231 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8232 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8233 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8234 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8235                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8236                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8237 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8238                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8239 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8240                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8241 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8242 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8243 00000061 8826[E004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8244                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8245 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8246 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8247 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8248 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8249 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8250                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8251 00000079 81FE[3505]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8252                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8253                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8254                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8255 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8256                                  
  8257                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8258                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8259                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8260                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8261                                  ;
  8262                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8263                                  ;
  8264                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8265                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8266                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8267                                  ;
  8268                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8269                                  
  8270                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8271                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8272 0000007F C706[1C05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8273 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8274 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8275 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8276                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8277                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8278 0000008E 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8279 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8280                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8281                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8282 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8283 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8284 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8285 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8286 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8287 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8288 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8289 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8290 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8291 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8292                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8293 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8294                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8295 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8296 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8297                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8298                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8299                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8300                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8301 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8302                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8303 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8304 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8305                                  					; mark operation complete
  8306 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8307 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8308 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8309 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8310 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8311 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8312 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8313 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8314 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8315                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8316                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  8317 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  8318 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  8319                                  
  8320                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8321                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8322                                  bc_retf:
  8323 000000CA CB                      		retf
  8324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8325                                  
  8326                                  command_error:				
  8327 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8328 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8329                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8330                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8331                                  
  8332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8333                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8334                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8335                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8336                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8337                                  ; high.
  8338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8339                                  
  8340                                  
  8341                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8342                                  
  8343                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  8344                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  8345                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8346                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8347                                  
  8348 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8349                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8350                                  		
  8351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8352                                  
  8353                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8354                                  
  8355                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8356 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8357                                  					; unknown command error
  8358                                  
  8359                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8360                                  
  8361                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8362                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8363                                  
  8364                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8365                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8366                                  
  8367                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8368                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8369                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8370 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8371 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8372                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8373 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8374 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8375 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8376                                  
  8377                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8378                                  
  8379                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8380
