  8382                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8384                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8385                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8386                                  
  8387                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8388                                  
  8389                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8390                                  
  8391                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8392                                  
  8393                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8394                                  
  8395                                  ;************************************************************************
  8396                                  ;*									*
  8397                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8398                                  ;*									*
  8399                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8400                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8401                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8402                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8403                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8404                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8405                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8406                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8407                                  ;*									*
  8408                                  ;************************************************************************
  8409                                  
  8410                                  
  8411                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8412                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  8413                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8414 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  8415                                  
  8416                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8417 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8418                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8419 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8420                                  					; 00 init
  8421 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8422 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8423 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8424                                  					; 03
  8425 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8426                                  					; 04
  8427 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8428                                  					; 05
  8429 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8430 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8431                                  					; 07
  8432 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8433                                  					; 08
  8434 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8435 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8436                                  con_table_end:
  8437 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8438                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8439 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8440 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8441 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8442 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8443 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8444                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8445 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8446                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8447 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8448 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8449 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8450 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8451 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8452 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8453 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8454 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8455 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8456 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8457 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8458 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8459 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8460 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8461 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8462 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8463 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8464 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8465 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8466 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8467                                  prn_table_end:
  8468 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8469                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8470 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8471 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8472 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8473 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8474 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8475 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8476 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8477 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8478 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8479 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8480 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8481                                  aux_table_end:
  8482 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8483                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8484 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8485 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8486 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8487 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8488 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8489 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8490 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8491 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8492 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8493 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8494                                  tim_table_end:
  8495                                  
  8496                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8497                                  
  8498                                  ;************************************************************************
  8499                                  ;*									*
  8500                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8501                                  ;*									*
  8502                                  ;************************************************************************
  8503                                  
  8504                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8505                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8506 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8507                                  con_loop:				
  8508 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8509 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8510 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8511                                  con_exit:				
  8512 00000164 F8                      		clc
  8513 00000165 C3                      		retn
  8514                                  
  8515                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8516                                  
  8517                                  ;************************************************************************
  8518                                  ;*									*
  8519                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8520                                  ;*									*
  8521                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8522                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8523                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8524                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8525                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8526                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8527                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8528                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8529                                  ;*									*
  8530                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8531                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8532                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8533                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8534                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8535                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8536                                  ;*									*
  8537                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8538                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8539                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8540                                  ;*									*
  8541                                  ;************************************************************************
  8542                                  
  8543                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8544                                  chrin:		
  8545 00000166 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8546 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8547 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8548 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8549 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8550 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8551 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8552 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8553 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8554 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8555 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8556 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8557                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8558                                  
  8559                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8560                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8561                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8562                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8563                                  ;      else
  8564                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8565                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8566                                  ;      endif
  8567                                  ;    endif
  8568                                  ;  endif
  8569                                  
  8570                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8571 00000183 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8572 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8573 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8574 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8575 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8576 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8577 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8578 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8580                                  
  8581                                  not_ext:				
  8582 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8583 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8584                                  alt_save:				
  8585 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8586                                  keyret:					
  8587 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8588                                  
  8589                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8590                                  
  8591                                  ;************************************************************************
  8592                                  ;*									*
  8593                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8594                                  ;*									*
  8595                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8596                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8597                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8598                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8599                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8600                                  ;*									*
  8601                                  ;************************************************************************
  8602                                  
  8603                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8604                                  con_rdnd:				
  8605 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8606 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8607 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8608 000001A6 8A26[DF04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8609 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8610 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8611 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8612 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8613 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8614                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8615 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8616                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8617 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8618 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8619 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8620 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8621                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8622                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8623                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8624                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8625 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8626 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8627 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8629                                  
  8630                                  gotchr:					
  8631 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8632 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8633 000001CF 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8634 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8635 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8636                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8637                                  
  8638                                  notbrk:					
  8639 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8640 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8641 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8642 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8644                                  
  8645                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8646 000001E0 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8647 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8648 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8649 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8650 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8651 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8652 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8653                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8654                                  rdexit:					
  8655 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8656 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8657                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8658                                  bc_exvec:				
  8659 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8660                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8661 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8662                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8663                                  
  8664                                  ;************************************************************************
  8665                                  ;*									*
  8666                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8667                                  ;*									*
  8668                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8669                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8670                                  ;*									*
  8671                                  ;************************************************************************
  8672                                  
  8673                                  con_writ:
  8674                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8675 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8676                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8677                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8678                                  con_lp:					
  8679 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8680 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8681 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8682                                  					; AL = character to display
  8683 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8684                                  cc_ret:					
  8685 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8686 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8687                                  
  8688                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8689                                  
  8690                                  ;************************************************************************
  8691                                  ;*									*
  8692                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8693                                  ;*									*
  8694                                  ;************************************************************************
  8695                                  
  8696                                  con_flush:
  8697 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8698                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8699 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8700 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8701                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8702                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8703                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8704 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8705 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8706 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8707                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8708 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8709                                  
  8710                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8711                                  
  8712                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8713                                  
  8714                                  ;************************************************************************
  8715                                  ;*									*
  8716                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8717                                  ;*									*
  8718                                  ;************************************************************************
  8719                                  
  8720                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8721                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8722                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8723                                  
  8724                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8725                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8726                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8727                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8728                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8729                                  ;
  8730                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8731                                  
  8732                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8733                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8734                                  
  8735                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8736                                  
  8737                                  ;************************************************************************
  8738                                  ;*									*
  8739                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8740                                  ;*									*
  8741                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8742                                  ;*									*
  8743                                  ;************************************************************************
  8744                                  
  8745                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8746 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8747                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8748                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8749                                  prn_done:
  8750 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8751 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8752                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8753                                  
  8754                                  ;************************************************************************
  8755                                  ;*									*
  8756                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8757                                  ;*									*
  8758                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8759                                  ;*									*
  8760                                  ;************************************************************************
  8761                                  
  8762                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8763                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8764 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8765                                  prn_loop:				
  8766 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8767                                  prn_out:				
  8768 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8769 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8770 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8771 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8772 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8773 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8774 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8775 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8776 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8777 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8778 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8780                                  
  8781                                  _prnwf:					
  8782 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8783 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8784                                  TestPrnError:				
  8785 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8786 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8787                                  pmessg:					
  8788 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8789                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8790                                  
  8791                                  prn_con:				
  8792 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8793 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8794                                  ;prn_done:				
  8795                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8796                                  prn_done2:
  8797                                  		;clc
  8798                                  		; cf=0
  8799 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8801                                  
  8802                                  ;************************************************************************
  8803                                  ;*									*
  8804                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8805                                  ;*									*
  8806                                  ;************************************************************************
  8807                                  
  8808                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8809 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8810 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8811 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8812                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8813                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8814 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8815 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8816                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8817                                  
  8818                                  ;************************************************************************
  8819                                  ;*									*
  8820                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8821                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8822                                  ;*									*
  8823                                  ;************************************************************************
  8824                                  
  8825                                  prnstat:				
  8826 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8827                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8828                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8829                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8830                                  
  8831                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8832                                  
  8833                                  ;************************************************************************
  8834                                  ;*									*
  8835                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8836                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8837                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8838                                  ;*									*
  8839                                  ;************************************************************************
  8840                                  
  8841                                  prnop:	
  8842 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8843 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8844                                  
  8845                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8846                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8847                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8848                                  
  8849 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  8850 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8851 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8852 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  8853 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8854 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8855 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8856                                  
  8857                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8858                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8859                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8860                                  
  8861                                  NextTest:				
  8862 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8863                                  					; i/o error?
  8864 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8865                                  
  8866                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8867                                  
  8868 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8869                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8870 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8871 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8872 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8873                                  ret1:					
  8874 00000282 C3                      		retn
  8875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8876                                  
  8877                                  checknotready:				
  8878 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8879 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8880 00000288 C3                      		retn
  8881                                  
  8882                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8883                                  
  8884                                  ;************************************************************************
  8885                                  ;*									*
  8886                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8887                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8888                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8889                                  ;*									*
  8890                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8891                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8892                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8893                                  ;*									*
  8894                                  ;************************************************************************
  8895                                  
  8896                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8897                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8898 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8899                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8900 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  8901 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  8902 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8903 0000028F 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8904 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8905                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8906 00000295 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8907 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  8908                                  prn_getstat:				
  8909 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8910 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8911 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8912 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8913 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8914 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8915 000002A7 26                      		es
  8916 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  8917                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8918                                  					; lodsb
  8919 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8920 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8921 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8922 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8923                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8924                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8925                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8926 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8927                                  
  8928                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8929                                  
  8930                                  prn_bperr:				
  8931 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8932                                  prn_berr:				
  8933 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8935                                  
  8936                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8937                                  
  8938                                  ;************************************************************************
  8939                                  ;*									*
  8940                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8941                                  ;*									*
  8942                                  ;************************************************************************
  8943                                  
  8944                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8945                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8946                                  
  8947                                  ;********************************;*
  8948                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8949                                  ;********************************;*
  8950                                  
  8951                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8952                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8953                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8954                                  
  8955                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8956                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8957                                  ;;endstruc
  8958                                  
  8959                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8960                                  
  8961                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8962                                  
  8963                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8964                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8965 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8966 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8967                                  					; ioc_pc
  8968 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8969                                  
  8970                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8971 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8972                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8973                                  
  8974                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8975 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8976 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8977 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8978                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8979 000002CF 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]

  8984 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8985 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8986 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8987 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8988                                  prngetcount:				
  8989                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8990 000002E4 898F[E104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8991 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8992                                  					; return current retry count
  8993                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8994                                  		; cf=0
  8995                                  		;clc

  9029                                  ;************************************************************************
  9030                                  ;*									*
  9031                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9032                                  ;*									*
  9033                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9034                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9035                                  ;*									*

  9039

  9041                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9042                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status

  9045                                  
  9046                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9047                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9048                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error

  9055

  9132 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9133 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)

  9155 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)

  9167                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*

  9172 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9173

  9175                                  
  9176                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9177                                  
  9178                                  ;************************************************************************
  9179                                  ;*									*
  9180                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9181                                  ;*									*

  9189 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9190                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9191                                  					; get port number
  9192 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9193                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9194                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9195 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9196                                  
  9197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9198                                  
  9199                                  ;************************************************************************
  9200                                  ;*									*
  9201                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9202                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9203                                  ;*									*
  9204                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9205                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9206                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9207                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9208                                  ;*									*

  9214                                  					; zero out buffer
  9215                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9216                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9217                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9218 00000368 C3                      		retn
  9219                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9220                                  
  9221                                  ;************************************************************************
  9222                                  ;*									*

  9224                                  ;*									*

  9226

  9236 00000374 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9237 00000377 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9238 00000379 B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9239 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9240                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9241                                  
  9242                                  awok:					
  9243 0000037E E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9244                                  					; still	more character to print
  9245                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9246                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9247                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9248 00000380 C3                      		retn

  9266 00000389 C3                      		retn

  9270                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9271                                  
  9272                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9273                                  ;								:
  9274                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9275                                  ;								:
  9276                                  ;								:
  9277                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9278                                  ;								:
  9279                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9280                                  ;								:
  9281                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9282                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9283                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9284                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9285                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9286                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9287                                  ;								:
  9288                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9289                                  ;								:
  9290                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9291                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9292                                  ;								:
  9293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9294                                  
  9295                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9296                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9297                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9298                                  
  9299                                  ;19/07/2019
  9300                                  ;09/03/2019
  9301                                  
  9302                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9303                                  
  9304                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9305                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9306                                  
  9307 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9308 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9309 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9310 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9311 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9312 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9313 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9314 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9315 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9316 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9317 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9318 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9319 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9320 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9321 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9322                                  
  9323                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9324                                  
  9325 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9326 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9327 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9328 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9329 000003B2 87CA                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9330 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9331 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9332 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9333 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9334 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9335 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9336 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9337 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9338 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9339 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9340 000003C8 98                      		cbw
  9341 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9342 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9343 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9344 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
  9345                                  
  9346                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9347                                  
  9348                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9349                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9350                                  
  9351                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9352                                  ;
  9353                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9354                                  ;
  9355                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9356                                  ;
  9357                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9358                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9359                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9360                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9361                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9362                                  ;
  9363                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9364                                  ;
  9365                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9366                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9367                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9368                                  ;
  9369                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9370                                  
  9371                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9372                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
  9373                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9374 000003CF 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9375 000003D2 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9376                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9377 000003D3 803E[EC04]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9378                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9379 000003D8 7423                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9380 000003DA 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9381                                  					; get binary hours
  9382                                  					; convert to bcd
  9383                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9384                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9385                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9386 000003DE E8E800                  		call	bintobcd
  9387 000003E1 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9388 000003E3 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9389                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9390                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9391 000003E7 E8DF00                  		call	bintobcd
  9392 000003EA 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9393 000003EC 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9394                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9395                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd
  9396 000003F0 E8D600                  		call	bintobcd
  9397                                  
  9398 000003F3 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9399 000003F5 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9400 000003F7 FA                      		cli
  9401 000003F8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9402 000003FA CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9403                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9404                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9405                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9406 000003FC FB                      		sti
  9407                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9408 000003FD 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9409 00000401 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9410                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9411 00000405 FF1E[B806]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9412                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9413                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9414                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9415 00000409 FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9416 0000040A B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9417 0000040C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9418                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9419                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9420                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9421 0000040E 8F06[E904]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9422 00000412 FB                      		sti
  9423                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9424 00000413 803E[EC04]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9425 00000418 7409                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9426                                  
  9427                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9428                                  		;call	far [daycnttoday]
  9429                                  		;;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9430                                  					; convert to bcd format

  9432                                  
  9433 0000041D FA                      		cli
  9434 0000041E B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9435 00000420 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9436                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9437                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9438                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9439 00000422 FB                      		sti
  9440                                  no_cmos_2:
  9441                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9442                                  		; cf=0
  9443                                  		;clc
  9444 00000423 C3                      		retn

  9448                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)

  9450                                  %if 1

  9452                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.
  9453                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  9454                                  
  9455                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
  9456                                  
  9457                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  9458                                  ;
  9459                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  9460                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  9461                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  9462                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  9463                                  
  9464                                  		; 20/12/2023
  9465                                  
  9466                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
  9467                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
  9468 00000424 FF36[E904]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
  9469 00000428 813E[E904]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9470                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  9471 0000042E 7308                    		jnb	short century20
  9472                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
  9473                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
  9474                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9475 00000430 C706[ED04]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
  9476 00000436 EB0C                    		jmp	short years
  9477                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9478                                  		
  9479                                  century20:				
  9480                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 20
  9481                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 0
  9482                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9483 00000438 C706[ED04]1400          		mov	word [base_century], 20
  9484 0000043E 812E[E904]891C          		sub	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9485                                  					; adjust daycnt
  9486                                  years:					
  9487 00000444 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9488 00000446 A1[E904]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9489 00000449 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  9490                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  9491 0000044C F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  9492 0000044E 8916[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  9493 00000452 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  9494 00000454 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  9495 00000456 0006[EE04]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  9496 0000045A FF06[E904]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  9497                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9498 0000045E BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
  9499 00000461 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
  9500                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
  9501 00000464 391E[E904]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
  9502 00000468 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  9503 0000046A FE06[EE04]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  9504                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  9505 0000046E 291E[E904]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
  9506                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  9507                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9508 00000472 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365
  9509                                  regularyear:	; 20/12/2023 (BugFix)
  9510                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
  9511 00000473 391E[E904]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9512 00000477 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  9513 00000479 FE06[EE04]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
  9514                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
  9515 0000047D 291E[E904]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9516 00000481 E2F0                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  9517                                  					;
  9518                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9519                                  leapyear:	
  9520 00000483 C606[F004]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
  9521                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  9522                                  					; change month table.
  9523                                  yeardone:				
  9524 00000488 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  9525 0000048A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9526 0000048C A1[E904]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9527                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  9528 0000048F BE[EF04]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  9529                                  		;mov	cx, 12
  9530                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9531 00000492 B10C                    		mov	cl, 12
  9532                                  months:					
  9533 00000494 FEC3                    		inc	bl
  9534                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9535 00000496 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:04B7h
  9536 00000498 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  9537                                  					; dh=0
  9538 0000049A 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  9539 0000049C 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  9540 0000049D 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  9541 0000049F E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  9542                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9543                                  month_done:	
  9544 000004A1 C606[F004]1C            		mov	byte [february], 28 ; 08/08/2023
  9545                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 28
  9546                                  					; restore month table value
  9547 000004A6 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  9548 000004A8 8A36[EE04]              		mov	dh, [base_year]
  9549 000004AC 8A0E[ED04]              		mov	cl, [base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  9550 000004B0 E81600                  		call	bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  9551                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  9552 000004B3 86C2                    		xchg	dl, al
  9553 000004B5 E81100                  		call	bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  9554 000004B8 86C6                    		xchg	dh, al
  9555 000004BA E80C00                  		call	bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  9556 000004BD 86C1                    		xchg	cl, al
  9557 000004BF E80700                  		call	bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  9558 000004C2 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  9559 000004C4 8F06[E904]              		pop	word [daycnt] ; restore original value
  9560 000004C8 C3                      		retn
  9561                                  
  9562                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9563                                  
  9564                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
  9565                                  
  9566                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  9567                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  9568                                  		
  9569 000004C9 D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
  9570 000004CB D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
  9571                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0
  9572 000004CD C3                      		retn
  9573                                  %endif
