 11575 00000B82 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11576 00000B84 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11577                                  noxor:
 11578 00000B88 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11579                                  disk_ret:
 11580 00000B8C F8                      		clc
 11581 00000B8D C3                      		retn
 11582                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11583                                  
 11584                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11585                                  
 11586                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11587                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11588                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11589                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11590                                  
 11591                                  do_write:
 11592 00000B8E 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11593 00000B92 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11594 00000B94 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11595 00000B98 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11596                                  do_norm:
 11597 00000B9A E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11598 00000B9D EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11599                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11600                                  
 11601                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11602                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11603                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11604                                  
 11605                                  doverify:
 11606 00000B9F 58                      		pop	ax
 11607 00000BA0 50                      		push	ax
 11608 00000BA1 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11609 00000BA3 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 11610 00000BA6 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11611                                  
 11612                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11613                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11614                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11615                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11616                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11617                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11618                                  
 11619 00000BA8 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11620 00000BAB 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11621 00000BAD FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11622 00000BB1 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11623 00000BB3 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11624 00000BB6 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11625                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11626                                  
 11627                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 11628 00000BB8 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 11629 00000BBB FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11630 00000BBF EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11631                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11632                                  
 11633                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11634                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11635                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11636                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11637                                  
 11638                                  dskerr:
 11639 00000BC1 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 11640 00000BC6 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11641 00000BC8 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 11642                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 11643 00000BCB 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11644 00000BD0 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11645 00000BD2 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11646 00000BD5 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11647                                  dochkagain:
 11648 00000BDA E8A900                  		call	again
 11649                                  dskerr0:
 11650 00000BDD 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11651 00000BDF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11652                                  					; fnon_removable
 11653 00000BE4 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11654 00000BE6 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11655 00000BE9 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11656                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 11657 00000BEB 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11658 00000BEE 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11659 00000BF0 C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11660                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11661                                  dskerr1:
 11662 00000BF6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11663                                  		;jmp	retry
 11664                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11665 00000BF7 E9FBFE                  		jmp	_retry
 11666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11667                                  
 11668                                  write_fault_err:
 11669 00000BFA BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11670                                  					; for write fault error.
 11671 00000BFD EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11672                                  
 11673                                  		; fall into harderr
 11674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11675                                  
 11676                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11677                                  
 11678                                  harderr:
 11679 00000BFF E84C00                  		call	maperror
 11680                                  harderr2:
 11681 00000C02 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11682                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11683 00000C07 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11684 00000C0B 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11685                                  
 11686                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11687                                  
 11688                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11689                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11690 00000C0F E916FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11691                                  
 11692                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11693                                  
 11694                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11695                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11696                                  
 11697                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11698                                  normspeed:
 11699 00000C12 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11700 00000C17 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11701 00000C19 06                      		push	es
 11702 00000C1A 50                      		push	ax
 11703 00000C1B A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11704 00000C1E C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11705 00000C22 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11706 00000C26 58                      		pop	ax
 11707 00000C27 07                      		pop	es
 11708 00000C28 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 11709                                  		; 24/12/2023
 11710                                  		;push	es
 11711                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 11712                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11713                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 11714                                  		;pop	es
 11715 00000C2B 1E                      		push	ds
 11716 00000C2C C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11717 00000C30 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 11718 00000C34 1F                      		pop	ds
 11719                                  
 11720 00000C35 C3                      		retn
 11721                                  
 11722                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11723                                  
 11724                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11725                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11726                                  
 11727                                  fastspeed:
 11728 00000C36 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11729                                  					; ftoobig
 11730 00000C3B 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11731 00000C3D 06                      		push	es
 11732 00000C3E 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11733 00000C42 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11734 00000C44 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11735 00000C48 07                      		pop	es
 11736 00000C49 C3                      		retn
 11737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11738                                  
 11739                                  notready:
 11740 00000C4A F9                      		stc
 11741 00000C4B B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11742 00000C4D C3                      		retn
 11743                                  
 11744                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11745                                  
 11746                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11747                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11748                                  
 11749                                  maperror:
 11750 00000C4E 51                      		push	cx
 11751 00000C4F 06                      		push	es
 11752 00000C50 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11753 00000C51 07                      		pop	es
 11754 00000C52 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11755 00000C54 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11756                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11757 00000C57 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11758                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11759 00000C5A BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11760 00000C5D F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11761                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11762                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11763                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11764 00000C5F 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11765                                  					; get translation
 11766                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11767                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11768 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 11769 00000C63 59                      		pop	cx
 11770 00000C64 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11771 00000C65 C3                      		retn
 11772                                  
 11773                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11774                                  
 11775                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11776                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11777                                  
 11778                                  set_tim:
 11779 00000C66 50                      		push	ax
 11780 00000C67 E8B1F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11781                                  
 11782                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11783                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11784                                  
 11785 00000C6A 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11786 00000C6E 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11787 00000C70 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11788                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11789                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11790 00000C74 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11791                                  setaccess:
 11792 00000C76 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11793 00000C7B 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11794 00000C7F 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11795                                  done_set:
 11796 00000C83 F8                      		clc
 11797                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11798 00000C84 58                      		pop	ax
 11799 00000C85 C3                      		retn
 11800                                  
 11801                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11802                                  
 11803                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11804                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11805                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11806                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11807                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11808                                  
 11809                                  again:	
 11810 00000C86 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11811 00000C89 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11812 00000C8C 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11813                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11814 00000C8E 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11815 00000C8F C3                      		retn
 11816                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11817                                  
 11818                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 11819 00000C90 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11820 00000C92 C3                      		retn

 11835                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11836                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11837                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11838                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed

 11926                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11927                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11928                                  ;
 11929                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11930                                  ;
 11931                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11932                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11933                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11934                                  ;
 11935                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11936                                  
 11937                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11938                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11939                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11940 00000CC3 E8A4F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11941 00000CC6 06                      		push	es
 11942 00000CC7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11943 00000CCB 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11944                                  					; RAWIO
 11945 00000CD0 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11946 00000CD4 07                      		pop	es
 11947 00000CD5 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11948                                  
 11949                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11950                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11951                                  
 11952                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11953 00000CD7 BE[940C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11954                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11955                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11956 00000CDA A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11957 00000CDC 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11958                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11959 00000CDE BE[A70C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11960                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11961                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11962                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11963 00000CE1 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11964 00000CE3 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11965 00000CE5 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11966 00000CE8 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11967 00000CEA 98                      		cbw
 11968 00000CEB D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11969 00000CED 46                      		inc	si
 11970 00000CEE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11971 00000CF0 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11972                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11973 00000CF3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11974                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11975                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11976 00000CF8 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11977 00000CFA C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11978                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11979                                  
 11980                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11981                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11982                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11983 00000CFB 5A                      		pop	dx
 11984                                  
 11985                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11986 00000CFC E9D6F3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11988

 11991                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11992                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11993                                  ;
 11994                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11995                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11996                                  ;
 11997                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11998                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11999                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 12000                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 12001                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12002                                  
 12003                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12004                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 12005                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 12006                                  
 12007 00000CFF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12008 00000D03 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12009                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 12010 00000D06 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12011 00000D0A 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12012 00000D0D 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12013 00000D11 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 12014                                  					; Mask off other bits
 12015 00000D14 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 12016 00000D17 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]

 12224                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12225                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12226                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12227                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12228                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12229                                  ;
 12230                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12231                                  ;
 12232                                  ; output:
 12233                                  ;	for status call:
 12234                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12235                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12236                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12237                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12238                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12239                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12240                                  ;
 12241                                  ;	for format track:
 12242                                  ;		carry set if error
 12243                                  ;
 12244                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12245                                  
 12246                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12247                                  
 12248                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12397                                  
 12398                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12399                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12400                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12401                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12402                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12403                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12404                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12405                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12406                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12407                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12408                                  		; register.
 12409                                  
 12410                                  					; Special function requested?

 12511                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

 12513                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12514                                  
 12515                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12516                                  ;
 12517                                  ; TrackIo:
 12518                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12519                                  ;
 12520                                  ;   input:
 12521                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12522                                  ;		  3 = write
 12523                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12524                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12525                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12526                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12527                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12528                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12529                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12530                                  ;
 12531                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12532                                  
 12533                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12534                                  		
 12535                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12536                                  TrackIo:	
 12537                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12538 00000F75 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12539 00000F79 E84DF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv

 12543 00000F83 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12544 00000F84 51                      		push	cx

 12546 00000F88 59                      		pop	cx
 12547 00000F89 58                      		pop	ax
 12548                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the

 12551 00000F8F D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1

 12553                                  
 12554                                  		; WE WANT:
 12555                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12556                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12557                                  		
 12558 00000F93 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12559                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12560 00000F96 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8

 12562                                  					; good_tracklayout

 12566                                  ionextsector:

 12571                                  					; the track table

 12575                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12576                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12577                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12578                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12579                                  		; 3). Good track layout

 12644                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12645                                  
 12646                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12647                                  ;
 12648                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12649                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12650                                  ; are permissible.

 12653                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index

 12686                                  ;
 12687                                  ; SetDASD
 12688                                  ;
 12689                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12690                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12691                                  ;
 12692                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12693                                  ;
 12694                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12695                                  
 12696                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12697                                  SetDasd:
 12698 00000FF8 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12699                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12700 00000FFD 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12701                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12702 00000FFF 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12703                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12704                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12705 00001004 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12706                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12707 00001006 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12708                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12709                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12710                                  DoSetDasd:
 12711 0000100B C606[2806]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12712 00001010 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12713 00001015 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12714                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12715 00001017 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12716 0000101B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12717                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12718                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12719 0000101E 7414                    		jz	short DoSet
 12720                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12721 00001020 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12722                                  		;cmp	ah, 1
 12723 00001022 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al	; 1
 12724                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12725                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12726                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12727                                  		; 24/12/2023

 12729                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12730                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12731 00001024 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12732                                  GotBig:
 12733                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12734                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12735 00001026 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12736 00001027 803E[2606]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12737 0000102C 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12738                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12739                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12740                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12741                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12743 0000102F C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h

 12752                                  
 12753 0000103A C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12754                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12755                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12756

 12758                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]

 12762 00001046 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12763 0000104A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12764                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12765                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12766 0000104C 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12767 00001050 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 12769                                  
 12770                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12771                                  
 12772                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12773                                  
 12774                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12775                                  ;
 12776                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12777                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12778                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12779                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12780                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12783                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12784                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12785                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12786                                  ;
 12787                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12788                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12789                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12790                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12791                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12792                                  ;
 12793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12794                                  
 12795                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12796                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12797 00001055 51                      		push	cx
 12798 00001056 52                      		push	dx
 12799                                  
 12800                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12801                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12802                                  
 12803 00001057 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12804 0000105C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12805 0000105E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12806 00001060 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12807 00001065 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12808 00001067 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12810                                  
 12811                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12812 00001069 06                      		push	es
 12813 0000106A 56                      		push	si
 12814                                  		
 12815                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12816                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12817 0000106B 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12818 0000106D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12819                                  
 12820 0000106F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12821                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12822                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12823 00001074 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12824 00001078 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12825                                  
 12826                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12827                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12828                                  
 12829 0000107C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12830 00001081 5E                      		pop	si
 12831 00001082 07                      		pop	es
 12832                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12833 00001083 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12834 00001087 49                      		dec	cx
 12835 00001088 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12836 0000108B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12837 0000108D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12838 0000108F 86CD                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12839 00001091 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12840 00001095 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12841 00001099 06                      		push	es
 12842 0000109A 1E                      		push	ds
 12843 0000109B 56                      		push	si
 12844 0000109C 57                      		push	di
 12845 0000109D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12846 0000109F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12847                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12848 000010A1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12849 000010A3 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12850 000010A8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12851 000010AA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12852                                  
 12853                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12854                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12855 000010AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12856 000010AD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12857 000010AF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12858                                  
 12859 000010B0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12860                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12861                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12862 000010B5 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12863 000010B9 8C06[2B06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12864                                  
 12865                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12866                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12867                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12868                                  		;mov	es, si
 12869 000010BD 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12870

 12932                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12933                                  ;
 12934                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12935                                  ;
 12936                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12937                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12938                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12939                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12940                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 12954                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 12960                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 12970                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12971                                  ;
 12972                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12973                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12974                                  ;
 12975                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12976                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12977                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12978                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12979                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12980                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12981                                  ;
 12982                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12983                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12984                                  ;
 12985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13044                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13046                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13047                                  
 13048                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13049                                  ;
 13050                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13051                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13052                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13053                                  ;
 13054                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13055                                  
 13056                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13057                                  ioctl_getown:
 13058 00001155 E812F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13059 00001158 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13060                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13061 0000115C C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13062                                  ownloop:				
 13063 00001160 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13064 00001164 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13065                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13066 00001166 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13067                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13068                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13069 0000116B 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13070                                  getnextBDS:				
 13071 0000116D 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13072 00001170 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13074                                  
 13075                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13076                                  ;
 13077                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13078                                  ; in al to al.
 13079                                  ;
 13080                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13081                                  
 13082                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13083                                  ioctl_setown:
 13084 00001172 E8F5F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13085 00001175 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13086                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13087 0000117A E84CF7                  		call	checksingle
 13088                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13089 0000117D FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13090                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13091                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13092                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13093                                  
 13094                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13095                                  ;
 13096                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13097                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13098                                  ;
 13099                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13100                                  
 13101                                  exitown:				
 13102 00001181 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13103                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13104 00001183 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13105                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13106                                  					; fi_am_mult

 13109                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13110                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13111 0000118E FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13112                                  exitnomult:				
 13113 00001190 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13114 00001194 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13115                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13116                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13117                                  		; cf=0
 13118                                  		;clc
 13119 00001197 C3                      		retn

 13178                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13179                                  ;	get media id
 13180                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13181                                  ;
 13182                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13183                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13184                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13185                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13186                                  ;
 13187                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13188                                  ;
 13189                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13190                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13191                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13192                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13193                                  ;
 13194                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13195                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13196                                  ;
 13197                                  ; LOGIC:
 13198                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13199                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13200                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13201                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13202                                  ;
 13203                                  ; {
 13204                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13205                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13206                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13207                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13208                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13209                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13210                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13211                                  ;		};
 13212                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13213                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13214                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13215                                  ;		};
 13216                                  ;	else
 13217                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13218                                  ;
 13219                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13220                                  
 13221                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13222                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13223                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13224                                  
 13225                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13226                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13227                                  GetMediaId:
 13228 000011C0 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13229 000011C3 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13230 000011C7 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13231 000011CC E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13232 000011CF 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13233                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13234 000011D1 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13235                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13236                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13237                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13238 000011D6 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13239                                  
 13240                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13241 000011D8 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13242 000011DB 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13243                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13244                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13245 000011DE 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13246 000011E0 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13247 000011E4 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13248                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13249 000011E8 46                      		inc	si
 13250                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13251                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13252 000011E9 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13253                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13254 000011EC B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13255                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13256                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13257 000011EF F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13258                                  	
 13259                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13260                                  		; cf = 0
 13261                                  		;clc
 13262                                  
 13263 000011F1 C3                      		retn
 13264                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13265                                  
 13266                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13267                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13268 000011F2 F9                      		stc	
 13269                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13270 000011F3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13271                                  		;stc
 13272                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13273                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13274 000011F5 C3                      		retn
 13275                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13276                                  
 13277                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13278                                  
 13279                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13280                                  ;  set media id
 13281                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13282                                  
 13283                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13284                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13285                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13286                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13287                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13288                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13289                                  ;
 13290                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13291                                  ;
 13292                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13293                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13294                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13295                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13296                                  ;
 13297                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13298                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13299                                  ;
 13300                                  ; logic:
 13301                                  ;
 13302                                  ; {
 13303                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13304                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13305                                  ;	BootIo;
 13306                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13307                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13308                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13309                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13310                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13311                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13312                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13313                                  ;		};
 13314                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13315                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13316                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13317                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13318                                  ;		};
 13319                                  ;	else
 13320                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13321                                  ;
 13322                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13323                                  
 13324                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13325                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13326                                  SetMediaId:
 13327 000011F6 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13328 000011F9 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13329                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13330 000011FD 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13331 000011FF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13332 00001204 52                      		push	dx
 13333 00001205 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13334 00001208 5A                      		pop	dx
 13335 00001209 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13336                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13337 0000120B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13338                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13339 00001210 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13340                                  		
 13341 00001212 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13342                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13343                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13344                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13345 00001217 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13346                                  
 13347 00001219 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13348 0000121A 57                      		push	di
 13349 0000121B 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13350 0000121C 07                      		pop	es
 13351 0000121D BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13352 00001220 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13353 00001224 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13354 00001227 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13355                                  
 13356                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13357                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13358                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13359                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13360                                  		;rep movsb
 13361 0000122A E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13362

 13364 0000122E 1F                      		pop	ds

 13373                                  					; return with error code from BootIo

 13386                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13387                                  
 13388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13389                                  ;	BootIo
 13390                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13391                                  ;
 13392                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13393                                  ;
 13394                                  ; input :
 13395                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13396                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13397                                  ;
 13398                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13399                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13400                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13401                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13402                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13403                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13404                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13405                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13406                                  ;
 13407                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13408                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13409                                  ;
 13410                                  ; logic:
 13411                                  ;
 13412                                  ; {
 13413                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13414                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13415                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13416                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13417                                  ; }
 13418                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13419                                  
 13420                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13421                                  BootIo:	
 13422 00001244 06                      		push	es
 13423 00001245 57                      		push	di
 13424 00001246 53                      		push	bx
 13425 00001247 1E                      		push	ds
 13426 00001248 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13427                                  
 13428                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13429                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13430                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13431                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13432                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13433                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13434                                  
 13435 00001249 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13436 0000124C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13437 0000124E 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13438 00001252 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13439 00001255 E8FBF6                  		call	diskio
 13440 00001258 5B                      		pop	bx
 13441 00001259 5F                      		pop	di
 13442 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 13443 0000125B C3                      		retn
 13444                                  
 13445                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13446                                  
 13447                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13448                                  
 13449                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13450                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13452                                  ;
 13453                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13454                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13455                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13456                                  ; history in the flags.
 13457                                  ;
 13458                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13459                                  ;
 13460                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13461                                  ;
 13462                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13463                                  ;
 13464                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13465                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13466                                  ;
 13467                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13468                                  
 13469                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13470 0000125C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13471 00001260 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13472 00001262 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13473                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13474 00001264 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13475                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13476                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13477 00001269 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13478 0000126B 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13479 00001270 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13480 00001272 E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13481 00001275 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13482                                  
 13483                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13484                                  
 13485 00001277 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13486 00001279 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13487                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13488                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13489 0000127B 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13490 0000127D 53                      		push	bx
 13491 0000127E BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13492                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13493                                  					; physical drive
 13494 00001281 E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13495 00001284 5B                      		pop	bx
 13496                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13497 00001285 C3                      		retn
 13498                                  
 13499                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13500                                  
 13501                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13502                                  
 13503                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13504                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13505                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13506                                  ;
 13507                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13508                                  ;
 13509                                  ; INPUT :
 13510                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13511                                  ;
 13512                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13513                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13514                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13515                                  
 13516                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13517                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13518 00001286 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13519 0000128A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13520                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13521                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13522 0000128D 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13523                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13524 0000128F 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13525                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13526                                  					; unformatted_media
 13527 00001294 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13528                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13529                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13530 00001296 40                      		inc	ax
 13531                                  GafDone:
 13532 00001297 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13533 0000129A C3                      		retn
 13534                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13535                                  
 13536                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13537                                  
 13538                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13539                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13540                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13541                                  ;
 13542                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13543                                  ;
 13544                                  ; input :
 13545                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13546                                  ;
 13547                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13548                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13549                                  
 13550                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13551                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13552 0000129B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13553 0000129F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13554                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13555 000012A2 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13556                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13557                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13558 000012A7 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13559 000012AB 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13560                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13561 000012AD 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13562                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13563                                  					; unformatted_media
 13564                                  saf_Done:				
 13565 000012B2 C3                      		retn

 13570                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13571                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13572                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13573                                  ;
 13574                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13575                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13576                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13577                                  ;
 13578                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13579                                  
 13580                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13581                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13582 000012B3 06                      		push	es
 13583 000012B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13584 000012B8 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13585                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13586                                  
 13587                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13588                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13589                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13590                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13591                                  
 13592 000012BC 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13593                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13594 000012BE 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13595                                  ioctl_support:
 13596 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
 13597 000012C1 07                      		pop	es
 13598                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13599                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13600 000012C2 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13601                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13602 000012C5 BF[B80C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13603                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13604                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13605 000012C8 86E0                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13606 000012CA F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13607 000012CC 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13608 000012CE B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13609                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13610                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13611                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13612                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13613                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13615                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13616 000012D1 07                      		pop	es
 13617                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13618                                  		; cf = 0
 13619                                  		;clc
 13620 000012D2 C3                      		retn
 13621                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13622                                  nosupport:
 13623 000012D3 07                      		pop	es
 13624 000012D4 E9FEED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
