 14996                                  		;;call	far 70h:8D1h	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:179Ah
 14997                                  		; 17/10/2022

 14999                                  		;call	far ptr	V86_Crit_SetFocus ; call far 70h:8D1h
 15000                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 15001                                  no_win386:

 15003 00001790 52                      		push	dx
 15004 00001791 268A5505                		mov	dl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 15005                                  					; get the drive	letter
 15006                                  
 15007                                  ; WARNING : next two instructions assume that if the new disk is for drive B
 15008                                  ;           then existing dsk is drive A & vice versa

 15010 00001795 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
 15011 00001797 80F601                  		xor	dh, 1
 15012 0000179A 29C9                    		sub	cx, cx		; nobody has handled swap disk
 15013 0000179C B8004A                  		mov	ax, 4A00h	; multMULT<<8)|multMULTSWPDSK
 15014                                  					; broad	cast code for swap disk

 15018 000017A2 741E                    		jz	short swpdsk9	; somebody has handled it
 15019

 15024 000017A7 2E8816[E117]            		mov	[cs:DRVLET], dl

 15058                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 15060                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15061                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15062                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15063                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15064                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15065                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15066                                  
 15067                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15068 000017C5 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15069 000017C7 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15069 000017D0 736B6574746520666F-
 15069 000017D9 7220647269766520   
 15070                                  
 15071                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15072 000017E1 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15072 000017EA 65737320616E79206B-
 15072 000017F3 6579207768656E2072-
 15072 000017FC 656164790D0A       
 15073 00001802 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15074                                  
 15075                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15076                                  
 15077                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15078                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15079                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15080                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15081                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15082                                  
 15083                                  chkopcnt:		
 15084 00001804 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15085 00001809 C3                      		retn
 15086                                  
 15087                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15088                                  
 15089                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15090                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15091                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15092                                  ;
 15093                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15094                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15095                                  
 15096                                  mediacheck:	
 15097 0000180A E8BCF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15098 0000180D 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15099 0000180F E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15100 00001812 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15101 00001814 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15102 00001817 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15103 00001819 50                      		push	ax
 15104 0000181A 52                      		push	dx
 15105 0000181B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15106                                  					; set logical drive number
 15107 0000181F B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15108 00001821 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15109                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15110                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15111 00001823 5A                      		pop	dx
 15112 00001824 58                      		pop	ax
 15113 00001825 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15114 00001827 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15115                                  
 15116                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15117                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15118                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15119                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15120                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15121                                  ; status.
 15122                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15123 0000182A 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15124 0000182E 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15125                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15126                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15127                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15128                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15129 00001832 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15130                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15131                                  
 15132                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15133                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15134                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15135                                  
 15136 00001834 50                      		push	ax
 15137 00001835 51                      		push	cx
 15138 00001836 52                      		push	dx
 15139 00001837 E8B6ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15140 0000183A 5A                      		pop	dx
 15141 0000183B 59                      		pop	cx
 15142 0000183C 58                      		pop	ax
 15143 0000183D 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15144 0000183F 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15145                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15146 00001841 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15147                                  mediaret:				
 15148 00001843 C3                      		retn
 15149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15150                                  
 15151                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15152                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15153                                  ; or write.
 15154                                  
 15155                                  mediadovolid:				
 15156 00001844 E849EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15157 00001847 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15158 00001849 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15159 0000184C 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15160 0000184E E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15161                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15162                                  
 15163                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15164                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15165                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15166                                  ; dos.
 15167                                  ;
 15168                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15169                                  
 15170                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15171                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15172                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15173                                  
 15174                                  checklatchio:	
 15175                                  
 15176                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15177                                  			
 15178 00001851 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15179 00001854 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15180                                  
 15181                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15182                                  
 15183 00001856 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15184 00001859 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15185                                  
 15186                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15187                                  ; expensive verification.
 15188                                  
 15189 0000185B E832EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15190 0000185E 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15191 00001860 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15192 00001863 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15193 00001865 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15194 00001867 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15195 00001869 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15196                                  checklatchret:				
 15197 0000186C E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15198                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15199 0000186F F9                      		stc
 15200 00001870 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15201                                  checkret:				
 15202 00001871 C3                      		retn
 15203                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15204                                  
 15205                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15206                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15207                                  ;
 15208                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15209                                  
 15210                                  checkfatvid:				
 15211 00001872 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15212 00001875 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15213 00001877 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15214                                  
 15215                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15216                                  
 15217                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15218                                  
 15219                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15220                                  
 15221                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15222                                  ;
 15223                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15224                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15225                                  ;
 15226                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15227                                  ;
 15228                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15229                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15230                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15231                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15232                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15233                                  ;
 15234                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15235                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15236                                  ; routine.)
 15237                                  ;
 15238                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15239                                  
 15240                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15241                                  check_vid:
 15242                                  
 15243                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15244                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15245                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15246                                  
 15247 00001879 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15248                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15249                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15250 0000187E 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15251 00001880 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15252 00001883 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15253 00001885 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15254 00001887 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15255                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15256 0000188C 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15257                                  					; if not fat system
 15258 0000188E E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15259 00001891 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15260 00001893 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15261 00001896 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15262                                  					; definitely changed
 15263 00001899 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15264                                  
 15265 0000189B 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15266                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15267 0000189C E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15268                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15269                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15270                                  		;clc
 15271                                  checkfatret:				
 15272 0000189F C3                      		retn
 15273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15274                                  
 15275                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15276                                  changed_drv:
 15277 000018A0 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15278 000018A1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15279                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15280 000018A6 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15282                                  
 15283                                  ; extended id check
 15284                                  
 15285                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15286                                  
 15287                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15288                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15289                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15290                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15291                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15292                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15293                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15294                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15295                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15296                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15297                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15298                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15299                                  ;
 15300                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15301                                  
 15302                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15303                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15304 000018A7 50                      		push	ax
 15305                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15306                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15307 000018A8 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15308                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15309 000018AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15310 000018AD 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15311 000018B1 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15312 000018B3 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15313 000018B6 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15314 000018BA 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15315                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15316                                  					; don't know
 15317 000018BC 58                      		pop	ax
 15318 000018BD EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15319                                  					; reset the flag
 15320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15321                                  
 15322                                  ext_changed:
 15323 000018BF 58                      		pop	ax
 15324                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15325 000018C0 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15326                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15327                                  					; disk changed!
 15328                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15329                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15330                                  		;clc
 15331 000018C1 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15332                                  
 15333                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15334                                  
 15335                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15336                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15337                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15338                                  ;
 15339                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15340                                  
 15341                                  checkio:				
 15342 000018C3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15343 000018C6 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15344 000018C8 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15345 000018CB 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15346 000018CD E8C0ED                  		call	GetBp
 15347 000018D0 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15348 000018D2 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15349 000018D5 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15350 000018D7 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15351 000018D9 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15352 000018DB 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15353 000018DC C3                      		retn
 15354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15355                                  
 15356                                  checkioerr:				
 15357 000018DD E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15358                                  
 15359                                  checkioret:				
 15360 000018E0 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15361 000018E1 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 15362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15363                                  
 15364                                  no_error_map:				
 15365 000018E4 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15366                                  
 15367                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15368                                  
 15369                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15370                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15371                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15372                                  
 15373                                  returnvid:		
 15374 000018E7 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15375                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15376 000018EA E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15377 000018ED B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15378 000018EF F9                      		stc
 15379 000018F0 C3                      		retn
 15380                                  
 15381                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15382                                  
 15383                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15384                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15385                                  ;
 15386                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15387                                  ; **trashes si**
 15388                                  
 15389                                  media_set_vid:				
 15390 000018F1 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15391                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15392                                  
 15393                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15394                                  
 15395                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15396                                  
 15397                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15398                                  
 15399                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15400                                  vid_into_packet:
 15401 000018F4 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15402 000018F5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15403 000018F9 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15404 000018FC 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15405 000018FE 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15406 00001901 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15407 00001904 1F                      		pop	ds
 15408                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15409 00001905 C3                      		retn
 15410                                  
 15411                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15412                                  
 15413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15414                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15415                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15416                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15417                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15418                                  ;
 15419                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15420                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15421                                  ;
 15422                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15423                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15424                                  ;		carry set
 15425                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15426                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15427                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15428                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15429                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15430                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15431                                  ;
 15432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15433                                  
 15434                                  hidensity:
 15435                                  
 15436                                  ; check for correct drive
 15437                                  		
 15438                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15439 00001906 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15440                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15441                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15442 0000190B 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15443                                  
 15444                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15445                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15446                                  
 15447 0000190D 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15448 00001912 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15449                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15450                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15451 00001914 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15452 00001917 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15453                                  
 15454                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15455                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15456                                  
 15457                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15458 00001919 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15459 0000191D 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15460                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15461                                  					; ffOther
 15462 0000191F 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15463 00001921 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15464                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15465                                  					; ff288
 15466 00001923 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15467 00001925 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15468 00001927 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15469                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15470                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15471 0000192A B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15472                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15473                                  					; 2 sides
 15474                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15475 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15476 0000192E BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15477                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15478                                  					; & head max
 15479                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15480 00001931 E9C5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15482                                  
 15483                                  Is720K:
 15484                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15485 00001934 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15486                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15487 00001935 E98EED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15489                                  
 15490                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15491                                  ;dofloppy:
 15492                                  		;retn
 15493                                  
 15494                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15495                                  
 15496                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15497                                  
 15498                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15499                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15500                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15501                                  ;
 15502                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15503                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15504                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15505                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15506                                  ;
 15507                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15508                                  ;
 15509                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15510                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15511                                  
 15512                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15513 00001938 06                      		push	es
 15514 00001939 57                      		push	di
 15515                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15516                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15517 0000193A C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15518                                  
 15519                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15520                                  
 15521                                  scan_bds:				
 15522 0000193E 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15523 00001942 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15524                                  
 15525                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15526                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15527                                  
 15528 00001944 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15529                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15530                                  get_next_bds:				
 15531 00001948 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15532                                  					; go to	next bds
 15533 0000194B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15534 0000194E 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15535 00001950 5F                      		pop	di
 15536 00001951 07                      		pop	es
 15537 00001952 C3                      		retn
 15538                                  
 15539                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15540                                  
 15541                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15542                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15543                                  ;
 15544                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15545                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15546                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15547                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15548                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15549                                  
 15550                                  checkromchange:	
 15551                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15552                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15553 00001953 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15554                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15555                                  					; fchanged
 15556 00001958 C3                      		retn
 15557                                  
 15558                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15559                                  
 15560                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15561                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15562                                  ;
 15563                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15564                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15565                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15566                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15567                                  
 15568                                  resetchanged:	
 15569                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15570                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15571 00001959 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15572                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15573                                  					; ~fchanged
 15574 0000195E C3                      		retn
 15575                                  
 15576                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15577                                  
 15578                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15579                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15580                                  ;
 15581                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15582                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15583                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15584                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15585                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15586                                  
 15587                                  haschange:
 15588                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15589                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15590 0000195F 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15591                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15592                                  					; fchangeline
 15593 00001964 C3                      		retn
 15594                                  
 15595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15596                                  
 15597                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15598                                  
 15599                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15600                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15601                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15602                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15603                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15604                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15605                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15606                                  
 15607                                  ; set_volume_id
 15608                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15609                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15610                                  ;
 15611                                  ;   on entry:
 15612                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15613                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15614                                  ;
 15615                                  ;   on exit:
 15616                                  ;	carry clear:
 15617                                  ;	   successful call
 15618                                  ;	carry set
 15619                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15620                                  
 15621                                  set_volume_id:				
 15622 00001965 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15623 00001966 50                      		push	ax
 15624 00001967 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15625 0000196A 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15626 0000196C E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15627 0000196F 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15628 00001971 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15629 00001974 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15630                                  setvret:				
 15631                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15632                                  		; cf = 0
 15633                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15634 00001977 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15635 00001978 5A                      		pop	dx
 15636 00001979 C3                      		retn
 15637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15638                                  
 15639                                  seterr:					
 15640 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15641 0000197B 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15642 0000197C C3                      		retn
 15643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15644 0000197D 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15645                                  
 15646                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15647                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15648                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15649                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15650                                  
 15651                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15652                                  
 15653                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15654                                  
 15655                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15656                                  ;
 15657                                  ;   on entry:
 15658                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15659                                  ;
 15660                                  ;   on exit:
 15661                                  ;	carry clear
 15662                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15663                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15664                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15665                                  ;
 15666                                  ;	carry set:
 15667                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15668                                  
 15669                                  read_volume_id:
 15670 0000197F 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15671 00001980 51                      		push	cx
 15672 00001981 53                      		push	bx
 15673 00001982 50                      		push	ax
 15674 00001983 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15675 00001984 57                      		push	di
 15676 00001985 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15677 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15678 00001987 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15679 0000198A BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15680                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15681 0000198D B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15682 00001990 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15683 00001992 5F                      		pop	di
 15684 00001993 07                      		pop	es
 15685 00001994 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15686                                  					; # of fats
 15687 00001998 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15688                                  					; sectors / fat
 15689 0000199C F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15690 0000199E 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15691                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15692                                  					;
 15693                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15694                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15695 000019A2 2EA3[7D19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15696                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15697                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15698 000019A6 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15699                                  					; # root dir entries
 15700 000019AA B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15701 000019AC D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15702                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15703                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15704 000019AE 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15705                                  next_sec:
 15706 000019AF 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15707 000019B0 2EA1[7D19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15708                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15709                                  					; get sector #
 15710 000019B4 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15711                                  					; sectors / track
 15712 000019B8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15713 000019BA F7F1                    		div	cx
 15714                                  
 15715                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15716                                  
 15717 000019BC 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15718                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15719 000019BD 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15720 000019BF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15721 000019C1 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15722                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15723 000019C5 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15724 000019C7 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15725 000019C9 E83BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15726                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15727 000019CC 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15728 000019CE B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15729 000019D1 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15730                                  fvid_loop:
 15731                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15732 000019D3 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15733                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15734 000019D5 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15735 000019D7 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15736 000019DA 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15737 000019DC 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15738 000019DF 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15739                                  ent_loop:
 15740 000019E1 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15741 000019E4 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15742 000019E6 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15743 000019E7 2EFF06[7D19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15744                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15745                                  					; next sector
 15746 000019EC E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15747                                  notfound:
 15748                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15749                                  		;xor	si, si
 15750 000019EE EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15752                                  
 15753                                  found_vid:
 15754                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15755                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15756 000019F0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15757 000019F1 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15758 000019F3 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15759 000019F4 57                      		push	di
 15760 000019F5 1E                      		push	ds
 15761 000019F6 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15762 000019F7 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15763 000019FA B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15764                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15765 000019FD F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15766                                  		;xor	al, al
 15767                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15768 000019FF 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15769 00001A00 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15770                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15771                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15772                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15773 00001A01 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15774 00001A02 07                      		pop	es
 15775                                  fvid_ret:
 15776                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15777 00001A03 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15778                                  				
 15779 00001A05 58                      		pop	ax
 15780                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15781                                  		; cf = 0
 15782                                  		;clc
 15783                                  rvidret:
 15784 00001A06 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15785 00001A07 59                      		pop	cx
 15786 00001A08 5A                      		pop	dx
 15787 00001A09 C3                      		retn
 15788                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15789                                  
 15790                                  no_vid:
 15791 00001A0A 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15792                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15793                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15794 00001A0B EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15796                                  
 15797                                  readviderr:
 15798 00001A0D 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15799 00001A0E 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15800 00001A0F EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15801                                  
 15802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15803                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15804                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15805                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15806 00001A11 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15807                                  		;
 15808                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15809                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15810                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15811                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15812 00001A14 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15813 00001A17 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15814                                  		;
 15815 00001A1A FC                      		cld
 15816 00001A1B C3                      		retn
 15817                                  
 15818                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15819                                  
 15820                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15821                                  ;
 15822                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15823                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15824                                  
 15825                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15826 00001A1C 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15827                                  		;push	si
 15828 00001A1D 51                      		push	cx
 15829                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15830 00001A1E 56                      		push	si
 15831                                  
 15832                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15833                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15834                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15835                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15836                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15837                                  		;cld
 15838                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15839 00001A1F E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15840                                  
 15841 00001A22 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15842                                  		
 15843                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15844 00001A24 5E                      		pop	si
 15845                                  chk_volid_ok:
 15846 00001A25 59                      		pop	cx
 15847                                  		;pop	si
 15848 00001A26 5F                      		pop	di
 15849 00001A27 C3                      		retn
 15850                                  
 15851                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15852                                  
 15853                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15854                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15855                                  ;
 15856                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15857                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15858                                  
 15859                                  check_volume_id:
 15860 00001A28 57                      		push	di
 15861 00001A29 51                      		push	cx
 15862                                  		
 15863                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15864                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15865                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15866                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15867                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15868                                  		;cld
 15869                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15870 00001A2A E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15871                                  
 15872 00001A2D F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15873                                  		
 15874                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15875                                  		;pop	cx
 15876                                  		;pop	di
 15877                                  		;retn
 15878 00001A2F EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 15879                                  
 15880                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15881                                  
 15882                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15883                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15884                                  ;
 15885                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15886                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15887                                  ;
 15888                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15889                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15890                                  ;
 15891                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15892                                  
 15893                                  fat_check:
 15894 00001A31 50                      		push	ax
 15895 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15896 00001A34 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15897 00001A37 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15898                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15899 00001A3B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15900 00001A3D 4E                      		dec	si
 15901                                  okret1:
 15902 00001A3E 58                      		pop	ax
 15903 00001A3F C3                      		retn
 15904

 15911

 15913                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15914                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15915

 15917

 15922                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15923

 15925                                  		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15926                                  %endif
