 34500                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34501                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34502                                  
 34503                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34504                                  
 34505                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34506                                  
 34507                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34508                                  ;
 34509                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34510                                  ;
 34511                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34512                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34513                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34514                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34515                                  ;
 34516                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34517                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34518                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34519                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34520                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34521                                  ;
 34522                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34523                                  
 34524                                  umb_coalesce:
 34525                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34526                                  	; ds = cs
 34527 00003320 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34528                                  
 34529 00003321 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34530                                  
 34531                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34532                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34533 00003323 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34534 00003327 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34535                                  uc_nextfree:
 34536 0000332C 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34537 0000332E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34538                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34539 00003330 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34540 00003335 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34541                                  					; N: get next arena
 34542 00003337 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34543 0000333A 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34544 0000333C EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34545                                  uc_again:
 34546 0000333E E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34547 00003341 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34548                                  uc_check:
 34549 00003343 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34550 00003348 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34551                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34552 0000334A 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34553 0000334F 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34554                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34555 00003350 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34556 00003354 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34557 00003357 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34558 00003359 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34559                                  
 34560                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34561                                  ;uc_done:
 34562                                  	;retn

 34585 0000336D 891E[501F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address

 34587                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34612                                  ;
 34613                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34614                                  ;
 34615                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34616                                  ;
 34617                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34618                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34619                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34620                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34621                                  ;				NC
 34622                                  ;			  else 
 34623                                  ;				CY
 34624                                  ;

 34626                                  ;

 34631                                  	; ds = cs

 34635                                  					;   possible
 34636                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34638                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34639                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34640                                  					; the largest UMB
 34641 00003393 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34642 00003395 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34643

 34652                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34653 000033A0 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34654                                  ua_err:
 34655 000033A2 F9                      	stc	
 34656                                  
 34657                                  	;clc
 34658                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34659                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34660                                  	; cf=0
 34661                                  	;clc 
 34662                                  ua_done:
 34663 000033A3 58                      	pop	ax
 34664 000033A4 C3                      	retn

 34666                                  ;ua_err:

 34671                                  ;
 34672                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34673                                  ;
 34674                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 34675                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34676                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged

 34679                                  
 34680                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34681                                  get_next:
 34682 000033A5 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'

 34684                                  _get_next_:
 34685 000033AC 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 34686 000033AE 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34687 000033B2 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34688 000033B3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 34691                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34692                                  	; cf=0
 34693                                  	;clc
 34694 000033B5 C3                      	retn

 34702                                  ;
 34703                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34704                                  ;
 34705                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34706                                  
 34707                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34708                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34709                                  LinkFirstUMB:

 34714

 34717

 34719                                  	; ds = cs
 34720                                  
 34721 000033BD CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 34722 000033BF B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34723 000033C1 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34724                                  
 34725 000033C3 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34726 000033C5 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34727

 34734

 34736 000033D2 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34737                                  					
 34738 000033D9 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34739 000033DD 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34740

 34742

 34744 000033E6 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34745 000033EC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34746                                  					; mark as free 
 34747 000033F3 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34748 000033F4 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34749

 34751                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34757                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34758                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 34766 00003407 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34767                                  ;scan_next
 34768                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34769                                  scannext:

 34772

 34777                                  	;jmp	short scan_next

 34780                                  got_last:

 34784

 34803                                  ;
 34804                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34805                                  ;
 34806                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34807                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34808                                  ;
 34809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34810                                  
 34811                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34812                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34813                                  	; ds = cs
 34814 00003427 833E[4A1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34815                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34816 0000342C 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34817 0000342E 06                      	push	es
 34818                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34819                                  	;push	bx
 34820                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34821                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34822                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34823                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34824 0000342F 8B1E[4E1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34825 00003433 2B1E[4A1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34826 00003437 8E06[4A1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34827                                  	
 34828 0000343B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34829 0000343E CD21                    	int	21h
 34830                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34831                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34832                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34833 00003440 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34834 00003442 48                      	dec	ax
 34835 00003443 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34836 00003445 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34837                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34838                                  	;pop	bx
 34839 0000344C 07                      	pop	es
 34840                                  su_exit:
 34841 0000344D C3                      	retn

 34858                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34859 00003455 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34860                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34861 00003457 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34862                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34863 0000345B 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34864 00003460 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34865                                  ulu_next:

 34867 00003468 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34868 0000346A 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34869 0000346C 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34870 0000346E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34871 00003470 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next

 34880                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34881                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34882                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34883                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34884                                  
 34885                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34886                                  ;
 34887                                  ; Summary:
 34888                                  ;
 34889                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34890                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34891                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34892                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34893                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34894                                  ;
 34895                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34896                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34897                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34898                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34899                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34900                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34901                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34902                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34903                                  ;
 34904                                  ; Example:
 34905                                  ;
 34906                                  ;   [menu]
 34907                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34908                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34909                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34910                                  ;
 34911                                  ;   [network]
 34912                                  ;   include misc
 34913                                  ;   device=foo
 34914                                  ;
 34915                                  ;   [misc]
 34916                                  ;   device=bar
 34917                                  ;   include alternate
 34918                                  ;
 34919                                  ;   [alternate]
 34920                                  ;   device=tar
 34921                                  ;
 34922                                  ;
 34923                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34924                                  ;
 34925                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34926                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34927                                  ;
 34928                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34929                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34930                                  ;   following order:
 34931                                  ;
 34932                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34933                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34934                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34935                                  ;
 34936                                  
 34937                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34938                                  
 34939                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34940                                  
 34941                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34942                                  
 34943                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34944                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34945                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34946                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34947                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34948                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34949                                  
 34950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34951                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34952                                  
 34953                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34954                                  
 34955                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34956                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34957                                  
 34958 0000347A 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 35094                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35095                                  ;
 35096                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35097                                  ;
 35098                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35099                                  ;
 35100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35101                                  
 35102                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35103                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35104                                  
 35105                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35106                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35107                                  parseline:
 35108                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35109                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35110                                  
 35111                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35112                                  
 35113                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35114                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35115                                  
 35116                                  nextswtch:
 35117                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35118                                  	je	short done_line
 35119                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35120                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35121                                  
 35122                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35123                                  
 35124                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35125                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35126                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35127                                  	je	short getparm
 35128                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35129                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35130                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35131                                  swterr:
 35132                                  	retn
 35133                                  
 35134                                  getparm:
 35135                                  	call	check_switch
 35136                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35137                                  	jc	short swterr
 35138                                  getnext:
 35139                                  	call	getchr
 35140                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35141                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35142                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35143                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35144                                  ;swterr:
 35145                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35146                                  
 35147                                  done_line:
 35148                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35149                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35150                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35151                                  	jnz	short okay
 35152                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35153                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35154                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35155                                  	retn
 35156                                  
 35157                                  okay:
 35158                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35159                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35160                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35161                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35162                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35163                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35164                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35165                                  	; cf=0
 35166                                  	;clc
 35167                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35168                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35169                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35170                                  ;exitpl:
 35171                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35172                                  	; ds = cs
 35173                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35174                                  	retn
 35175                                  put_back:
 35176                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35177                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35178                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35179                                  
 35180                                  %endif

 35182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35183                                  ;
 35184                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35185                                  ;
 35186                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35187                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35188                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35189                                  ; error.
 35190                                  ;
 35191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35192                                  
 35193                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35194                                  
 35195                                  err_swtch:
 35196 000034DC 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35197                                  err_check:
 35198 000034DE F9                      	stc
 35199                                  err_chk:
 35200                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35201 000034DF C3                      	retn
 35202                                  
 35203                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35204                                  
 35205                                  check_switch:
 35206 000034E0 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 35207                                  	;jc	short err_check
 35208 000034E3 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 35209 000034E5 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 35210 000034E7 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35211                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35212 000034E9 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35213 000034EB 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 35214 000034ED 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 35215                                  
 35216 000034EF 06                      	push	es
 35217                                  
 35218 000034F0 0E                      	push	cs
 35219 000034F1 07                      	pop	es
 35220                                  
 35221                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 35222                                  	;mov	ch,0
 35223                                  	;mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 35224                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35225 000034F2 BF[CA49]                	mov	di,switchlist
 35226 000034F5 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 35227 000034F7 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 35228 000034F9 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 35229                                  
 35230 000034FA F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 35231                                  
 35232 000034FC 07                      	pop	es
 35233 000034FD 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 35234                                  
 35235 000034FF B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 35236 00003502 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 35237 00003504 8B1E[3749]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 35238 00003508 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 35239 0000350A 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 35240                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35241 0000350C A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 35242                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 35243 0000350E 74CF                    	jz	short done_swtch
 35244                                  
 35245 00003510 E8F40C                  	call	getchr
 35246 00003513 72C7                    	jc	short err_swtch
 35247                                  
 35248 00003515 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 35249 00003517 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 35250                                  
 35251 00003519 E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 35252 0000351C 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 35253                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35254                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 35255                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35256                                  	; ds = cs
 35257 0000351D C606[AE02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 35258 00003522 E8980D                  	call	getnum
 35259                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35260                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35261 00003525 C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 35262 0000352A 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35263                                  
 35264                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35265                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35266                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35267

 35282                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35283                                  ;
 35284                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35285                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35286                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35287                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35288                                  ;
 35289                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35290                                  
 35291                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35292                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35293                                  process_num:
 35294 0000352B 850E[3749]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35295 0000352F 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35296                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35297 00003531 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35298                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35299 00003534 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35300 00003536 A2[3649]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35301                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35302                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35303                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35304                                  	; cf=0
 35305 00003539 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35306                                  try_f:
 35307                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35308 0000353A F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35309                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35310 0000353D 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35311                                  
 35312                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35313                                  
 35314                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35315 0000353F A2[0F48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35316                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35317                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35318                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35319                                  	; cf=0
 35320 00003542 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35321                                  try_t:
 35322 00003543 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35323 00003545 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35324                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35325 00003547 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35326                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35327 0000354A 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35328                                  
 35329                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 35330 0000354C A3[1248]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 35331                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35332                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35333                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35334                                  	; cf=0
 35335 0000354F C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35336                                  try_s:
 35337                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35338 00003550 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 35339                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 35340 00003553 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35341 00003555 A3[3449]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35342                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35343                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35344                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35345                                  	; cf=0
 35346 00003558 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35347                                  
 35348                                  ; must be for number of heads
 35349                                  
 35350                                  try_h:
 35351 00003559 A3[3249]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 35352                                  done_ret:
 35353                                  	;clc
 35354                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35355                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35356                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 35357                                  	;clc
 35358 0000355C C3                      	retn

 35368                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35369                                  ;
 35370                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.

 35372                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35373                                  
 35374                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35375                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35376

 35380                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35381                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35382                                  
 35383                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35384                                  
 35385                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35386                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35387                                  
 35388                                  nextswtch:
 35389 0000355D 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35390 0000355F 741C                    	je	short done_line
 35391 00003561 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35392 00003563 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35393                                  
 35394                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35395                                  
 35396 00003565 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?

 35398 00003569 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'

 35401                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35402                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35403                                  swterr:
 35404 0000356E C3                      	retn
 35405

 35408 00003572 891E[3749]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35409 00003576 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 35410                                  getnext:
 35411 00003578 E88C0C                  	call	getchr
 35412                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35413                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35414                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35415 0000357B 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 35416                                  ;swterr:
 35417                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35418                                  
 35419                                  done_line:
 35420                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35422                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified

 35425                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35426                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35427 00003585 C3                      	retn
 35428                                  
 35429                                  ;exitpl:
 35430                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35431                                  	; ds = cs
 35432                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 35433                                  	;retn
 35434                                  
 35435                                  put_back:

 35437 0000358A FF0E[5A03]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35438 0000358E EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 35439

 35444 00003599 C706[3448]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35445                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine

 35459                                  ;
 35460                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35461                                  ;
 35462                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35463                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35464                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35465                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35466                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35467                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35468                                  ;
 35469                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35470                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35471                                  ;
 35472                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35473                                  ;
 35474                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35475                                  
 35476                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35477                                  
 35478                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35479                                  
 35480                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35481                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35482                                  
 35483                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35484                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35485                                  
 35486                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35487                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35488                                  	; ds = cs
 35489                                  
 35490 0000359F 06                      	push	es
 35491                                  
 35492 000035A0 0E                      	push	cs
 35493 000035A1 07                      	pop	es
 35494                                  
 35495 000035A2 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35496 000035A4 8A1E[0F48]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35497 000035A8 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35498 000035AB 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35499                                  
 35500 000035AD C706[1248]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35501                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35502                                  got_80:
 35503 000035B3 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 35504 000035B5 8BB7[B649]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35505                                  
 35506                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 35507                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35508 000035B9 BF[1548]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 35509 000035BC B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 35510                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35511                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM A_BPB.size
 35512 000035BF FC                      	cld
 35513                                  	;repe	movsb
 35514                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35515 000035C0 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 35516                                  
 35517 000035C2 07                      	pop	es
 35518                                  
 35519                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35520 000035C3 F606[3749]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35521                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35522 000035C8 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 35523                                  
 35524 000035CA A1[3449]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 35525                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 35526 000035CD A3[2248]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 35527                                  
 35528                                  see_heads:
 35529                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35530 000035D0 F606[3749]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35531                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35532 000035D5 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 35533                                  
 35534 000035D7 A1[3249]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 35535                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 35536 000035DA A3[2448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 35537                                  
 35538                                  heads_not_altered:
 35539                                  
 35540                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35541                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35542                                  
 35543                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35544                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35545                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35546                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35547 000035DD B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35548 000035E0 A2[1748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35549                                  
 35550 000035E3 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35551                                  
 35552                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35553                                  
 35554                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35555                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35556 000035E5 8A3E[1F48]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35557                                  	
 35558                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35559                                  	; ax = 2
 35560 000035E9 3906[2448]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35561                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35562 000035ED 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediaid ; just use default if heads>2
 35563                                  
 35564 000035EF 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35565                                  
 35566                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35567                                  
 35568 000035F1 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35569                                  
 35570                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35571                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35572                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35573                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35574                                  
 35575                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35576                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35577                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35578                                  
 35579 000035F3 833E[2248]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35580 000035F8 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35581 000035FA 833E[1248]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35582 000035FF 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35583                                  
 35584                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35585                                  
 35586 00003601 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35587                                  
 35588                                  ;	check for 320K
 35589                                  
 35590                                  not_144m:
 35591 00003603 833E[1248]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35592 00003608 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35593 0000360A 833E[2248]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35594 0000360F 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35595                                  
 35596 00003611 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35597 00003613 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediaid
 35598                                  
 35599                                  only_one_head:
 35600                                  
 35601                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35602                                  
 35603 00003615 803E[0F48]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35604 0000361A 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35605                                  
 35606                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35607                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35608                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35609                                  
 35610 0000361C B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35611 0000361E 833E[2248]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35612                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35613 00003623 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35614                                  
 35615 00003625 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35616                                  
 35617                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35618                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35619                                  
 35620                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35621                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35622                                  	; ax = 2
 35623 00003627 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35624 00003628 A2[1748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35625                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35626                                  
 35627                                  got_correct_mediaid:
 35628 0000362B 881E[1F48]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35629                                  
 35630                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35631                                  
 35632 0000362F A1[1248]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35633 00003632 F726[2448]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35634 00003636 F726[2248]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35635 0000363A A3[1D48]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35636 0000363D F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35637                                  
 35638 0000363E C3                      	retn
 35639                                  
 35640                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 36184                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36185                                  ;
 36186                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36187                                  ;
 36188                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36189                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36190                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36191                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36192                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36193                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36194                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36195                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36196                                  ;
 36197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36198                                  
 36199                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36200                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36201                                  
 36202                                  skip_comment:
 36203 00003847 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36204                                  
 36205                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36206                                  	; ds = cs	
 36207                                  
 36208 00003849 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36209                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36210 0000384E 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36211                                  
 36212 00003850 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36213                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36214 00003855 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36215                                  
 36216 00003857 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36217                                  	
 36218 0000385A 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36219                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36220 0000385E 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36221                                  
 36222 00003860 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36223                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36224 00003865 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36225                                  
 36226 00003867 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36227                                  	
 36228 0000386B 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36229                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36230 0000386F 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36231                                  skip_cmmt:
 36232 00003871 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36233 00003873 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36234 00003876 46                      	inc	si
 36235 00003877 49                      	dec	cx
 36236 00003878 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36237 0000387A 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36238                                  no_commt:
 36239 0000387C C3                      	retn

 36241                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36242                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 36243                                  
 36244                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36245                                  ;%if 0
 36246

 36249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36250                                  ;
 36251                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36252                                  ;
 36253                                  ;   INPUT
 36254                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36255                                  ;
 36256                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36257                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36258                                  ;
 36259                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36260                                  ;       All
 36261                                  ;
 36262                                  ;   HISTORY
 36263                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36264                                  ;
 36265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36266                                  
 36267                                  kbd_read:
 36268 0000387D F606[DA46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36269 00003882 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36270                                  
 36271 00003884 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36272 00003885 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36273 00003887 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36274                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36275                                  kbd_loop:
 36276 00003889 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36277 0000388B CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36278 0000388D 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36279 0000388F B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36280 00003891 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36281 00003893 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36282 00003895 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36283 00003897 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36284                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36285                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36286 0000389A 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36287                                  
 36288 0000389F 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36289 000038A1 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36290                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36291 000038A3 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36292                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36293 000038A4 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36294 000038A6 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36295 000038A8 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36296 000038AA A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36297 000038AC 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36298 000038AE 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36299 000038AF 43                              inc     bx
 36300                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36301 000038B0 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36302                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36303 000038B5 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36304 000038B7 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36305 000038B9 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36306 000038BB 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36307 000038BD 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36308                                  
 36309                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36310 000038BF 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36311 000038C2 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36312                                  	
 36313 000038C4 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36314 000038C7 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36315                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36316 000038C9 BA[714B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36317 000038CC E8DD0B                          call    print
 36318                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36319 000038CF 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36320 000038D4 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36321                                  kbd_notf5:
 36322                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36323 000038D6 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36324 000038D9 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36325                                  
 36326 000038DB 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36327 000038DE 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36328                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36329 000038E0 BA[AF4B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36330 000038E3 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36331 000038E6 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36332 000038E8 881E[DE46]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36333                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36334 000038EC B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36335 000038EE CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36336 000038F0 C606[E446]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36337 000038F5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36338 000038F7 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36339                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36340 000038F9 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36341 000038FC 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36342                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36343 000038FE E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36344 00003901 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36345 00003902 C3                              retn			;
 36346                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36347 00003903 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36348 00003904 C3                              retn			;
 36349                                  
 36350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36351                                  ;
 36352                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36353                                  ;
 36354                                  ;   INPUT
 36355                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36356                                  ;
 36357                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36358                                  ;       None
 36359                                  ;
 36360                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36361                                  ;       None
 36362                                  ;
 36363                                  ;   HISTORY
 36364                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36365                                  ;
 36366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36367                                  
 36368                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36369                                  
 36370                                  set_numlock:
 36371                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36372                                  	;push	ax
 36373 00003905 1E                              push    ds
 36374 00003906 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36375 00003908 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36376 0000390A 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36377 0000390D 2E3B06[4C4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36378 00003912 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36379 00003914 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36380 00003919 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36381                                  not_off:
 36382 0000391B 2E3B06[4A4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36383 00003920 F9                              stc
 36384 00003921 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36385 00003923 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36386                                  set_done:
 36387 00003928 1F                              pop     ds
 36388                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36389                                  	;pop	ax
 36390 00003929 C3                              retn
 36391                                  
 36392                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36393                                  
 36394                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36395                                  ;
 36396                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36397                                  ;
 36398                                  ;   INPUT
 36399                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36400                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36401                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36402                                  ;
 36403                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36404                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36405                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36406                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36407                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36408                                  ;
 36409                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36410                                  ;       All
 36411                                  ;
 36412                                  ;   NOTES
 36413                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36414                                  ;
 36415                                  ;   HISTORY
 36416                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36417                                  ;
 36418                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36419                                  
 36420                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36421                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36422                                  
 36423                                  menu_check:
 36424                                  
 36425                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36426                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36427                                  
 36428 0000392A 51                              push    cx              ;
 36429 0000392B 56                              push    si              ;
 36430 0000392C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36431                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36432 0000392E E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36433 00003931 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36434 00003933 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36435 00003935 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36436 00003937 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36437 00003938 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36438                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36439 0000393A 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36440 0000393C 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36441 0000393E 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36442 00003940 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36443 00003942 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36444 00003945 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36445 0000394A EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36446                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36447 0000394C 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36448 0000394E 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36449                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36450 00003950 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36451                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36452 00003953 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36453 00003955 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36454 00003957 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36455 00003959 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36456 0000395B E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36457 0000395E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36458 00003960 3A06[961E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 36459 00003964 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36460 00003966 800E[DA46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36461 0000396B EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36462                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36463 0000396D 3A06[A21E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 36464 00003971 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36465 00003973 800E[DA46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36466 00003978 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36467                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36468 0000397A E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36469 0000397D EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36470                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36471 0000397F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36472 00003980 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36473                                  
 36474                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36475                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36476                                  
 36477 00003981 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36478 00003986 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36479                                  ;
 36480                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36481                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36482                                  ;
 36483 00003988 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36484 0000398B 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36485 0000398D E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36486                                  
 36487                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36488                                  
 36489                                  menu_search:
 36490 00003990 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36491 00003992 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36492 00003995 E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36493 00003998 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36494 0000399A C606[1747]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36495 0000399F E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36496                                  
 36497                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36498                                  
 36499                                  menu_color:
 36500 000039A2 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36501 000039A3 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36502                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36503                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36504                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36505 000039A4 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36506 000039A7 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36507 000039AA 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36508                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36509                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36510                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36511                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36512 000039AC 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36513 000039AE E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36514 000039B1 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36515 000039B3 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36516 000039B6 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36517 000039B9 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36518                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36519                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36520 000039BB B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36521 000039BD D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36522 000039BF 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36523                                  check_color:
 36524 000039C1 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36525 000039C3 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36526 000039C5 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36527                                  set_color:
 36528 000039C8 8816[D546]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36529 000039CC 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36530 000039CD 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36531 000039CE E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36532                                  
 36533                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36534                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36535                                  
 36536                                  menu_found:
 36537 000039D1 C606[DF46]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36538                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36539 000039D6 C606[E346]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36540 000039DB 8026[DE46]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36541                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36542 000039E0 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36543 000039E2 8916[E146]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36544                                  
 36545 000039E6 E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36546                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36547                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36548                                  
 36549                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36550                                  
 36551                                  menu_process:
 36552 000039E9 E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36553 000039EC 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36554 000039EE 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36555 000039F0 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36556 000039F2 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36557 000039F4 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36558 000039F6 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 36559 000039F8 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 36560 000039FA 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 36561 000039FC 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 36562 000039FE 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 36563 00003A00 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 36564 00003A02 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 36565 00003A04 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36566 00003A06 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 36567 00003A08 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 36568 00003A0A 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36569 00003A0C E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 36570 00003A0F 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
