 36571 00003A11 F9                              stc                     ;
 36572 00003A12 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 36573 00003A15 EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36574                                  menu_numlock:
 36575 00003A17 E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 36576 00003A1A EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36577                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 36578 00003A1C EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 36579                                  
 36580                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36581                                  
 36582                                  menu_default:
 36583 00003A1E 8936[E146]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 36584 00003A22 803E[E446]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36585 00003A27 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36586 00003A29 E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 36587 00003A2C 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36588 00003A2E E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36589 00003A31 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 36590 00003A33 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 36591 00003A35 E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 36592 00003A38 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36593                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36594 00003A3B 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36595 00003A3D B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36596                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 36597 00003A3F 881E[E346]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36598                                  timeout_skip:
 36599 00003A43 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36600                                  
 36601                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36602                                  
 36603                                  menu_item:
 36604                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 36605 00003A45 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 36606 00003A48 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 36607 00003A4A 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 36608 00003A4C E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 36609 00003A4F 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 36610 00003A51 F9                              stc                     ;
 36611 00003A52 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 36612 00003A55 EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 36613                                  
 36614                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36615                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36616                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36617                                  
 36618                                  menu_itemfound:
 36619 00003A57 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 36620 00003A58 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36621 00003A5A 8887[E546]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 36622 00003A5E 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 36623                                  
 36624                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 36625                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 36626                                  ;   description...
 36627                                  
 36628 00003A60 89B7[EF46]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 36629 00003A64 89B7[0347]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 36630 00003A68 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 36631 00003A6A E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 36632 00003A6D 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36633 00003A6F E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 36634 00003A72 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36635 00003A74 87FB                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 36636 00003A76 89BF[0347]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 36637                                  
 36638                                  menu_nextitem:
 36639 00003A7A E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36640 00003A7D E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36641                                  
 36642                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36643                                  
 36644                                  menu_getdefault:
 36645 00003A80 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36646 00003A82 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36647 00003A84 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36648 00003A86 E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36649                                  menu_valid:
 36650 00003A89 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36651 00003A8B 8816[E046]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36652 00003A8F 8B3E[E146]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36653 00003A93 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36654 00003A95 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36655 00003A97 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36656                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36657 00003A98 53                              push    bx              ;
 36658 00003A99 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36659 00003A9B 8BB7[EF46]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36660 00003A9F B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36661 00003AA2 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36662 00003AA3 06                              push    es              ;
 36663 00003AA4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36664 00003AA5 E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 36665 00003AA8 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36666 00003AA9 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36667 00003AAA 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 36668 00003AAC 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36669 00003AAD 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 36670 00003AB1 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 36671                                  menu_nodefault:
 36672 00003AB3 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 36673                                  menu_setdefault:
 36674 00003AB5 881E[DF46]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36675                                  
 36676                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36677                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36678                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36679                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36680                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36681                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36682                                  
 36683 00003AB9 803E[E346]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36684 00003ABE 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 36685 00003AC0 F606[DE46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 36686 00003AC5 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 36687 00003AC7 E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 36688                                  
 36689                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 36690                                  
 36691                                  menu_display:
 36692 00003ACA B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 36693 00003ACC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36694 00003ACE B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 36695 00003AD0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36696 00003AD2 06                              push    es              ;
 36697 00003AD3 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 36698 00003AD6 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36699 00003AD8 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36700 00003ADC A3[DC46]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 36701 00003ADF 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 36702 00003AE3 A2[DB46]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 36703 00003AE6 A1[D646]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 36704 00003AE9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36705 00003AEB B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 36706 00003AEE 8A3E[D546]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 36707 00003AF2 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36708                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36709 00003AF4 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36710 00003AF9 FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36711                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36712 00003AFB 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36713 00003B00 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36714 00003B02 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36715 00003B04 8A36[D946]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36716                                  menu_clear:
 36717 00003B08 CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36718 00003B0A 07                              pop     es              ;
 36719 00003B0B 8836[D946]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 36720 00003B0F BA[EC4B]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 36721 00003B12 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 36722                                  
 36723 00003B15 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36724 00003B1A 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 36725 00003B1C 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36726 00003B20 8A36[D946]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 36727 00003B24 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 36728 00003B26 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 36729 00003B28 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36730 00003B2A BA[3A4C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 36731 00003B2D E87C09                          call    print           ;
 36732 00003B30 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 36733 00003B32 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36734 00003B34 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 36735 00003B37 8816[D846]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 36736                                  
 36737                                  menu_nostatus:
 36738 00003B3B BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 36739                                  menu_disploop:
 36740 00003B3E E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 36741 00003B41 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 36742 00003B42 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 36743 00003B46 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36744                                  
 36745                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 36746                                  
 36747 00003B48 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 36748 00003B4A 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36749 00003B4C 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 36750 00003B4F 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36751 00003B53 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 36752 00003B55 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36753                                  
 36754 00003B57 BA[274C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 36755 00003B5A E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36756 00003B5D E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36757 00003B60 BA[F849]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36758 00003B63 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36759 00003B66 FF36[DA46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36760 00003B6A 800E[DA46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36761 00003B6F E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36762 00003B72 8F06[DA46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36763                                  
 36764                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36765                                  
 36766                                  menu_autoselect:
 36767 00003B76 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36768 00003B79 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36769 00003B7B E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36770                                  menu_abort:
 36771 00003B7E 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36772 00003B80 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36773                                  
 36774                                  normal_boot:
 36775 00003B83 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36776 00003B86 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36777 00003B88 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36778 00003B8C 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36779 00003B8E E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36780                                  
 36781                                  not_topmenu:
 36782 00003B91 80BF[E546]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36783 00003B96 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36784 00003B98 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36785 00003B9A 8BBF[EF46]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36786 00003B9E E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36787 00003BA1 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36788 00003BA3 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36789 00003BA5 E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36790                                  
 36791                                  not_submenu:
 36792 00003BA8 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36793 00003BAA 8B9F[EF46]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36794                                  
 36795                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36796                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36797                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36798                                  
 36799                                  no_selection:
 36800 00003BAE 891E[E146]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36801 00003BB2 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36802 00003BB6 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36803 00003BB8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36804 00003BB9 8E1E[9714]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36805 00003BBD 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36806                                  
 36807                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36808                                  ;
 36809                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36810                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36811                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36812                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36813                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36814                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36815                                  ;
 36816                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36817                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36818                                  
 36819                                  copyblock_loop:
 36820 00003BBF 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36821 00003BC0 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36822 00003BC3 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36823 00003BC4 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36824                                  
 36825                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36826                                  
 36827                                  copyblock_begin:
 36828                                  
 36829                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36830                                  %if 0
 36831                                          push    ax              ;
 36832                                          push    cx              ;
 36833                                          push    si              ;
 36834                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36835                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36836                                          push    ds              ;
 36837                                          push    cs              ;
 36838                                          pop     ds              ;
 36839                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36840                                          pop     ds              ;
 36841                                          pop     di              ;
 36842                                          pop     si              ;
 36843                                          pop     cx              ;
 36844                                          pop     ax              ;
 36845                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36846                                  %endif
 36847                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36848 00003BC6 57                      	push	di
 36849 00003BC7 BF[2447]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36850 00003BCA E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36851 00003BCD 5F                      	pop	di
 36852 00003BCE 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36853                                  
 36854 00003BD0 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36855 00003BD2 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36856 00003BD4 57                              push    di              ;
 36857 00003BD5 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36858 00003BD7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36859 00003BD8 06                              push    es              ;
 36860 00003BD9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36861 00003BDA E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36862 00003BDD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36863 00003BDE 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36864                                  copyblock_check:
 36865 00003BDF 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36866 00003BE1 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36867 00003BE3 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36868 00003BE6 EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36869                                  
 36870                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36871 00003BE8 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36872 00003BEB E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36873 00003BEE 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36874 00003BF0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36875 00003BF2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36876 00003BF4 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36877 00003BF6 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36878                                  ;
 36879                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36880                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36881                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36882                                  ;
 36883                                  move_config:
 36884 00003BF8 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36885 00003BFA 51                              push    cx              ;
 36886                                  ;
 36887                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36888                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36889                                  ;
 36890                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36891 00003BFB B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36892 00003BFE BE[1747]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36893 00003C01 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36894                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36895                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36896                                  copy_boot: 
 36897                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36898 00003C02 2E                              cs
 36899 00003C03 AC                      	lodsb
 36900 00003C04 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36901 00003C06 47                              inc     di              ;
 36902 00003C07 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36903                                  
 36904 00003C09 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36905                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36906                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36907 00003C0A B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36908 00003C0C 2E8B36[E146]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36909 00003C11 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36910 00003C13 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36911 00003C15 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36912 00003C16 07                              pop     es              ;
 36913 00003C17 BE[2447]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36914 00003C1A 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36915 00003C1D E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36916 00003C20 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36917 00003C22 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36918 00003C24 46                              inc     si              ;
 36919 00003C25 47                              inc     di              ;
 36920 00003C26 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36921 00003C28 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36922 00003C2B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36923                                  
 36924                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36925                                  
 36926 00003C2C 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36927 00003C2E 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36928 00003C33 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36929 00003C35 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36930                                  
 36931 00003C36 51                              push    cx              ;
 36932 00003C37 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36933 00003C39 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36934 00003C3A 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36935 00003C3C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36936                                  
 36937                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36938                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36939                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36940                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36941                                  ;   is empty.
 36942                                  
 36943 00003C3D 06                              push    es              ;
 36944 00003C3E 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36945 00003C40 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36946 00003C41 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36947 00003C47 E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36948 00003C4A 07                              pop     es
 36949                                  
 36950                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36951                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36952                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36953                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36954                                  
 36955                                  menu_done:
 36956 00003C4B 803E[D646]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36957 00003C50 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36958 00003C52 06                              push    es              ;
 36959 00003C53 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36960 00003C56 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36961 00003C58 A1[DC46]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36962 00003C5B 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36963 00003C5F A0[DB46]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36964 00003C62 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36965 00003C66 07                              pop     es              ;
 36966                                  menu_exit:
 36967 00003C67 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36968 00003C6B 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36969                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36970                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36971                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36972                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36973 00003C6F C3                      	retn
 36974                                  
 36975                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36976                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36977                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36978                                  
 36979                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36980                                  ;
 36981                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36982                                  ;
 36983                                  ;   INPUT
 36984                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36985                                  ;
 36986                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36987                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36988                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36989                                  ;
 36990                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36991                                  ;       None
 36992                                  ;
 36993                                  ;   NOTES
 36994                                  ;       None
 36995                                  ;
 36996                                  ;   HISTORY
 36997                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36998                                  ;
 36999                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37000                                  
 37001                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37002                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37003                                  
 37004                                  copy_envvar:
 37005 00003C70 51                              push    cx              ;
 37006 00003C71 56                              push    si              ;
 37007 00003C72 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37008 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;
 37009 00003C74 06                              push    es              ;
 37010 00003C75 8E06[9714]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37011 00003C79 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37012                                  
 37013                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37014                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37015                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37016                                  ;
 37017                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37018                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37019                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37020                                  
 37021 00003C7A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37022                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37023 00003C7C AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37024 00003C7D 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37025                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37026 00003C7F 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37027 00003C81 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37028                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37029 00003C83 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37030 00003C85 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37031                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37032 00003C87 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37033 00003C89 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37034 00003C8A 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37035 00003C8C 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37036 00003C8E B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37037 00003C90 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37038 00003C92 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37039 00003C94 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37040 00003C95 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37041                                  copy_varsrch:
 37042 00003C97 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37043 00003C9A 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37044 00003C9C 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37045 00003C9E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37046 00003C9F 56                              push    si              ;
 37047 00003CA0 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37048 00003CA2 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37049 00003CA3 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37050 00003CA4 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37051 00003CA6 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37052 00003CAA 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37053                                  
 37054                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37055                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37056                                  
 37057 00003CAC B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37058 00003CAF F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37059 00003CB1 56                              push    si              ;
 37060 00003CB2 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37061 00003CB4 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37062 00003CB6 2E8B0E[9514]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37063 00003CBB 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37064                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37065                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37066                                  
 37067 00003CBD F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37068 00003CBE 26                      	es	; 26h
 37069 00003CBF A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37070                                  
 37071 00003CC0 5E                      	pop     si
 37072                                  copy_envprep:
 37073 00003CC1 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37074 00003CC4 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37075 00003CC6 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37076 00003CC9 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37077                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37078                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37079                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37080 00003CCB AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37081 00003CCC 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37082 00003CCE 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37083 00003CD0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37084 00003CD2 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37085 00003CD4 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37086 00003CD5 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37087                                  
 37088                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37089 00003CD7 51                              push    cx              ;
 37090 00003CD8 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37091 00003CDB F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37092 00003CDD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37093 00003CDE EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37094                                  
 37095                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37096                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37097                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37098                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37099                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37100                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37101                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37102                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37103                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37104                                  
 37105                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37106 00003CE0 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37107 00003CE2 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37108                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37109 00003CE3 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37110 00003CE6 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37111                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37112 00003CEB F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37113                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37114 00003CEC F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37115 00003CED 07                              pop     es              ;
 37116 00003CEE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37117 00003CEF 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37118 00003CF0 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37119                                  
 37120                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37121 00003CF1 C3                              retn
 37122                                  
 37123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37124                                  ;
 37125                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37126                                  ;
 37127                                  ;   INPUT
 37128                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37129                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37130                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37131                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37132                                  ;
 37133                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37134                                  ;       Same as above
 37135                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37136                                  ;
 37137                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37138                                  ;       All
 37139                                  ;
 37140                                  ;   NOTES
 37141                                  ;       None
 37142                                  ;
 37143                                  ;   HISTORY
 37144                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37145                                  ;
 37146                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37147                                  
 37148                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37149                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37150                                  
 37151                                  copy_block:
 37152 00003CF2 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37153 00003CF5 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37154 00003CF7 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37155 00003CF9 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37156 00003CFB 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37157                                  
 37158 00003CFD 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37159 00003CFF 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37160 00003D01 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37161                                  
 37162                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37163                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37164                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37165                                  
 37166 00003D03 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37167 00003D08 57                              push    di              ;
 37168                                  
 37169 00003D09 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37170 00003D0C E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37171 00003D0F 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37172                                  
 37173 00003D11 BF[2447]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37174 00003D14 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37175 00003D17 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37176                                  
 37177 00003D19 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37178 00003D1B E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37179 00003D1E 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37180                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37181                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37182 00003D20 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37183 00003D22 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37184 00003D23 51                              push    cx              ;
 37185 00003D24 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37186 00003D26 56                              push    si              ;
 37187 00003D27 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37188 00003D28 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37189 00003D2A E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37190 00003D2D E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37191 00003D30 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37192 00003D31 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37193 00003D32 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37194 00003D34 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37195                                  
 37196                                  copy_error:
 37197                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37198 00003D36 F8                      	clc
 37199                                  copy_skip:
 37200 00003D37 5F                              pop     di
 37201                                  ;copy_error:
 37202                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37203                                  	;clc                    ;
 37204 00003D38 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37205 00003D3B EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37206                                  
 37207                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37208                                  
 37209                                  copy_line:
 37210 00003D3D 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37211 00003D3F 47                              inc     di              ;
 37212 00003D40 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37213 00003D42 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37214 00003D44 2E803E[9A14]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37215 00003D4A 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37216 00003D4C E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37217 00003D4F 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37218 00003D51 47                              inc     di              ;
 37219 00003D52 47                              inc     di              ;
 37220 00003D53 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37221                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37222 00003D55 E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37223 00003D58 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37224 00003D5A 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37225 00003D5C 47                              inc     di              ;
 37226                                  copy_next:
 37227 00003D5D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37228 00003D5F 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37229                                  
 37230                                  copy_nextline:
 37231 00003D61 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37232 00003D64 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37233                                  
 37234                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37235                                  ;copy_done:
 37236                                          ;retn
 37237                                  
 37238                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37239                                  ;
 37240                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37241                                  ;
 37242                                  ;   INPUT
 37243                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37244                                  ;
 37245                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37246                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37247                                  ;
 37248                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37249                                  ;       DX
 37250                                  ;
 37251                                  ;   NOTES
 37252                                  ;       None
 37253                                  ;
 37254                                  ;   HISTORY
 37255                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37256                                  ;
 37257                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37258                                  
 37259                                  get_linenum:
 37260 00003D66 50                              push    ax              ;
 37261 00003D67 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37262 00003D69 51                              push    cx              ;
 37263 00003D6A 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37264 00003D6C 56                              push    si              ;
 37265 00003D6D 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37266 00003D72 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37267                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37268 00003D74 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37269 00003D77 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37270 00003D79 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37271 00003D7A 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37272 00003D7C 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37273                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37274 00003D7E 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37275 00003D7F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37276 00003D80 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37277 00003D81 C3                              retn
 37278                                  
 37279                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37280                                  ;
 37281                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37282                                  ;
 37283                                  ;   INPUT
 37284                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37285                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37286                                  ;
 37287                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37288                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37289                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37290                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37291                                  ;
 37292                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37293                                  ;       None
 37294                                  ;
 37295                                  ;   NOTES
 37296                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37297                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37298                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37299                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37300                                  ;
 37301                                  ;   HISTORY
 37302                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37303                                  ;
 37304                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37305                                  
 37306                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37307 00003D82 50                              push    ax              ;
 37308 00003D83 51                              push    cx              ;
 37309 00003D84 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37310 00003D89 56                              push    si              ;
 37311 00003D8A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37312 00003D8C 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37313 00003D8D 06                              push    es              ;
 37314 00003D8E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37315 00003D8F E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37316 00003D92 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37317 00003D94 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37318 00003D96 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37319 00003D97 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37320 00003D98 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37321 00003D99 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37322                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37323 00003D9A C3                              retn			;
 37324                                  
 37325                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37326                                  ;
 37327                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37328                                  ;
 37329                                  ;   INPUT
 37330                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37331                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37332                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37333                                  ;
 37334                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37335                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37336                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37337                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37338                                  ;
 37339                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37340                                  ;       AX
 37341                                  ;
 37342                                  ;   NOTES
 37343                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37344                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37345                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37346                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37347                                  ;
 37348                                  ;   HISTORY
 37349                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37350                                  ;
 37351                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37352                                  
 37353                                  find_block:
 37354 00003D9B E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37355 00003D9E 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37356 00003DA0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37357 00003DA2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37358 00003DA4 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37359 00003DA6 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37360 00003DA8 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37361 00003DAA 2E800E[9A14]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37362 00003DB0 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37363                                  check_line:
 37364 00003DB2 2E800E[9A14]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37365 00003DB8 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37366 00003DBB 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37367                                  next_line:
 37368 00003DBD E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37369 00003DC0 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37370                                  ;find_exit:
 37371                                  ;	retn
 37372                                  
 37373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37374                                  ;
 37375                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37376                                  ;
 37377                                  ;   INPUT
 37378                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37379                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37380                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37381                                  ;
 37382                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37383                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37384                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37385                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37386                                  ;
 37387                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37388                                  ;       AX
 37389                                  ;
 37390                                  ;   NOTES
 37391                                  ;       None
 37392                                  ;
 37393                                  ;   HISTORY
 37394                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37395                                  ;
 37396                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37397                                  
 37398                                  comp_names:
 37399 00003DC2 57                              push    di              ;
 37400                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37401 00003DC3 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37402 00003DC6 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37403 00003DC8 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37404 00003DCB 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37405 00003DCD 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37406 00003DCF 47                              inc     di              ;
 37407 00003DD0 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37408                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37409 00003DD3 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37410 00003DD5 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37411 00003DD7 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37412                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37413 00003DD8 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37414 00003DD9 C3                              retn			;
 37415                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37416 00003DDA 86E0                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37417 00003DDC E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37418 00003DDF 86E0                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37419 00003DE1 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37420                                  
 37421                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37422                                  
 37423                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37424                                  comp_names_x:
 37425                                  	;
 37426                                  comp_names_safe:
 37427 00003DE3 50                              push    ax
 37428 00003DE4 51                              push    cx
 37429 00003DE5 56                              push	si
 37430 00003DE6 1E                              push    ds
 37431 00003DE7 0E                              push    cs
 37432 00003DE8 1F                              pop     ds
 37433 00003DE9 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37434 00003DEC 1F                              pop     ds
 37435 00003DED 5E                      	pop	si
 37436 00003DEE 59                              pop     cx
 37437 00003DEF 58                              pop     ax
 37438 00003DF0 C3                              retn
