 37440                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37441                                  ;
 37442                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 37443                                  ;
 37444                                  ;   INPUT
 37445                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37446                                  ;
 37447                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37448                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37449                                  ;
 37450                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37451                                  ;       None
 37452                                  ;
 37453                                  ;   NOTES
 37454                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37455                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37456                                  ;
 37457                                  ;   HISTORY
 37458                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37459                                  ;
 37460                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37461                                  
 37462                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37463                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37464                                  
 37465                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37466 00003DF1 50                              push    ax              ;
 37467 00003DF2 53                              push    bx              ;
 37468 00003DF3 51                              push    cx              ;
 37469 00003DF4 52                              push    dx              ;
 37470 00003DF5 56                              push    si              ;
 37471 00003DF6 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37472 00003DF8 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37473 00003DFC CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37474 00003DFE 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37475 00003DFF B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37476 00003E01 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37477 00003E03 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37478 00003E06 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37479 00003E08 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37480 00003E0A 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37481 00003E0C 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37482 00003E0E 8A26[D546]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37483 00003E12 3A1E[DF46]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37484 00003E16 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37485 00003E18 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37486 00003E1B 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37487 00003E1D B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37488 00003E1F D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37489 00003E21 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37490 00003E23 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37491 00003E25 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37492                                  print_other:                    ;
 37493 00003E28 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37494 00003E2A 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37495 00003E2C 8BBF[0347]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37496 00003E30 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37497 00003E32 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37498 00003E36 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37499 00003E38 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37500 00003E3B CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37501 00003E3D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37502 00003E3F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37503 00003E41 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37504                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37505 00003E43 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37506 00003E46 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37507 00003E48 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37508 00003E4A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37509 00003E4C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37510                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37511 00003E4E B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37512 00003E51 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37513 00003E53 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37514 00003E55 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37515 00003E57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37516 00003E59 06                              push    es              ;
 37517                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37518 00003E5A 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37519 00003E5D 47                              inc     di              ;
 37520 00003E5E 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37521 00003E60 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37522 00003E62 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37523                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37524 00003E64 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37525 00003E66 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37526 00003E68 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37527 00003E6A 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37528 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37529 00003E6E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37530 00003E70 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37531 00003E72 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37532 00003E75 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37533 00003E77 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37534 00003E79 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37535 00003E7B EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37536                                  print_done:                     ;
 37537 00003E7D 07                              pop     es              ;
 37538 00003E7E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37539 00003E7F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37540 00003E81 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37541 00003E83 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37542 00003E84 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37543 00003E85 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37544 00003E86 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37545 00003E87 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37546 00003E88 C3                              retn			;
 37547                                  
 37548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37549                                  ;
 37550                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37551                                  ;
 37552                                  ;   INPUT
 37553                                  ;       None
 37554                                  ;
 37555                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37556                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37557                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37558                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37559                                  ;
 37560                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37561                                  ;       None
 37562                                  ;
 37563                                  ;   NOTES
 37564                                  ;       None
 37565                                  ;
 37566                                  ;   HISTORY
 37567                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37568                                  ;
 37569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37570                                  
 37571                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37572 00003E89 8A1E[DF46]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37573 00003E8D 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37574 00003E8F E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37575 00003E92 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37576 00003E95 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37577 00003E9A 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37578 00003E9C B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37579 00003E9E CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37580 00003EA0 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37581                                  check_time:
 37582 00003EA2 A0[E346]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37583 00003EA5 2A06[E446]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37584 00003EA9 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37585 00003EAB 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 37586 00003EB0 C606[E446]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37587 00003EB5 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37588                                  show_time:
 37589 00003EB8 53                              push    bx              ;
 37590 00003EB9 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37591 00003EBB 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37592 00003EBF B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37593 00003EC1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37594 00003EC3 52                              push    dx              ;
 37595 00003EC4 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37596 00003EC7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37597 00003EC9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37598 00003ECB BA[9A4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37599 00003ECE E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37600 00003ED1 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37601 00003ED3 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37602 00003ED4 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37603 00003ED6 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37604 00003ED8 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37605 00003EDA 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37606 00003EDC B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37607 00003EDE CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37608 00003EE0 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37609 00003EE2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37610 00003EE4 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37611 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37612 00003EE8 5A                              pop     dx
 37613 00003EE9 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37614 00003EEB CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37615 00003EED 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37616                                  input_key:
 37617 00003EEE B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37618 00003EF0 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37619 00003EF2 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37620 00003EF4 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37621 00003EF6 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37622 00003EFB 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37623 00003EFD B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37624 00003EFF CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37625 00003F01 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37626 00003F03 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37627 00003F05 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37628 00003F07 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37629 00003F09 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37630                                  got_time:
 37631 00003F0B 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37632 00003F0D 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37633 00003F0F 0036[E446]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37634 00003F13 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37635                                  got_key:
 37636 00003F15 50                              push    ax              ;
 37637 00003F16 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37638 00003F19 8706[E346]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37639 00003F1D 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37640 00003F1F 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37641 00003F21 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37642 00003F22 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37643 00003F25 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37644 00003F29 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37645 00003F2C CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37646 00003F2E 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37647                                  
 37648                                  timeout_disabled:
 37649 00003F2F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37650 00003F30 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37651 00003F32 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37652 00003F34 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37653 00003F36 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37654                                  
 37655 00003F38 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37656 00003F3A 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37657 00003F3C 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37658 00003F3F 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37659 00003F41 FE0E[DF46]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37660 00003F45 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37661 00003F48 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37662 00003F4A EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37663                                  not_up:
 37664 00003F4C 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37665 00003F4E 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37666 00003F50 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37667 00003F54 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37668 00003F56 FE06[DF46]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37669 00003F5A E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37670 00003F5D 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37671                                  print1: 
 37672 00003F5E 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37673                                  print2: 
 37674 00003F60 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37675 00003F63 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37676                                  to_input_key:
 37677 00003F66 EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37678                                  not_down:
 37679 00003F68 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37680 00003F6D 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37681 00003F6F 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37682 00003F71 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37683 00003F73 8036[DE46]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37684 00003F78 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37685 00003F7B E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37686                                  not_f8:
 37687 00003F7E 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37688 00003F80 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37689                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37690                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37691                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37692 00003F82 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37693 00003F87 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37694 00003F8A B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37695 00003F8C EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37696                                  
 37697                                  normal_key:
 37698 00003F8E 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37699 00003F90 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37700 00003F92 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37701 00003F94 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 37702 00003F96 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 37703 00003F99 C3                              retn			;
 37704                                  not_backspace:
 37705 00003F9A 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 37706 00003F9C 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 37707 00003F9E 3A06[E046]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 37708 00003FA2 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37709 00003FA4 A2[DF46]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37710 00003FA7 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37711 00003FAA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37712 00003FAC EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37713                                  
 37714                                  select_done:
 37715 00003FAE B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 37716 00003FB0 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37717 00003FB2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37718                                  
 37719                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37720                                  
 37721                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37722                                  
 37723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37724                                  ;
 37725                                  ;   disp_input: display a single character + cr/lf
 37726                                  ;
 37727                                  ;   INPUT
 37728                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37729                                  ;
 37730                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37731                                  ;       None
 37732                                  ;
 37733                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37734                                  ;       None
 37735                                  ;
 37736                                  ;   NOTES
 37737                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37738                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37739                                  ;
 37740                                  ;   HISTORY
 37741                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37742                                  ;
 37743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37744                                  
 37745                                  disp_input:
 37746 00003FB4 50                      	push	ax
 37747                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 37748                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 37749                                  	;mov	al,' '
 37750                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 37751 00003FB5 B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37752 00003FB7 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37753 00003FB9 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37754                                  disp_ok:
 37755 00003FBB 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37756                                  disp_input_ok:
 37757 00003FBD B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37758 00003FBF CD21                    	int	21h
 37759 00003FC1 BA[F849]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37760 00003FC4 E8E504                  	call	print
 37761 00003FC7 58                      	pop	ax
 37762 00003FC8 C3                      	retn
 37763                                  
 37764                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37765                                  
 37766                                  disp_num:
 37767 00003FC9 53                              push    bx
 37768 00003FCA 0430                            add     al,'0'
 37769 00003FCC B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 37770 00003FCE 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37771 00003FD2 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 37772 00003FD5 CD10                            int     10h
 37773 00003FD7 5B                              pop     bx
 37774 00003FD8 C3                              retn
 37775                                  
 37776                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37777                                  ;
 37778                                  ;   show_status: display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 37779                                  ;
 37780                                  ;   INPUT
 37781                                  ;       None
 37782                                  ;
 37783                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37784                                  ;       None
 37785                                  ;
 37786                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37787                                  ;       None
 37788                                  ;
 37789                                  ;   NOTES
 37790                                  ;       None
 37791                                  ;
 37792                                  ;   HISTORY
 37793                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37794                                  ;
 37795                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37796                                  
 37797                                  show_status:
 37798 00003FD9 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37799 00003FDA 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37800 00003FDE B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37801 00003FE0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37802 00003FE2 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37803 00003FE3 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37804 00003FE5 8B16[D846]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 37805 00003FE9 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37806 00003FEE 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 37807 00003FF0 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 37808 00003FF2 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37809 00003FF4 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37810 00003FF7 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 37811                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37812                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 37813 00003FFA EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 37814                                  show_onoff: 
 37815 00003FFC CD10                            int     10h
 37816                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37817                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37818                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37819                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37820                                  
 37821 00003FFE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 37822 00004001 803E[DE46]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 37823 00004006 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 37824 00004008 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 37825                                  show_noton:                     ;
 37826 0000400B B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 37827                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 37828 0000400D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37829                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 37830 0000400F 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37831 00004010 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37832 00004012 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 37833 00004014 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37834 00004015 C3                              retn			;
 37835                                  
 37836                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 37838                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37839                                  ;
 37840                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37841                                  ;
 37842                                  ;   INPUT
 37843                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37844                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37845                                  ;
 37846                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37847                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37848                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37849                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37850                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37851                                  ;
 37852                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37853                                  ;       AX
 37854                                  ;
 37855                                  ;   NOTES
 37856                                  ;       None
 37857                                  ;
 37858                                  ;   HISTORY
 37859                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37860                                  ;
 37861                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37862                                  
 37863                                  skip_token:
 37864 00004016 E84D00                          call    get_char
 37865 00004019 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37866 0000401B E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37867 0000401E 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37868                                  skip_check_eol:
 37869 00004020 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37870 00004022 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37871 00004024 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37872 00004026 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37873 00004028 F8                              clc
 37874                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37875 00004029 C3                      	retn
 37876                                  skip_token_eol:
 37877 0000402A F9                              stc
 37878                                  skip_token_done:
 37879 0000402B C3                              retn
 37880                                  
 37881                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37882                                  ;
 37883                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37884                                  ;
 37885                                  ;   INPUT
 37886                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37887                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37888                                  ;
 37889                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37890                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37891                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37892                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37893                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37894                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37895                                  ;
 37896                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37897                                  ;       AX
 37898                                  ;
 37899                                  ;   NOTES
 37900                                  ;       None
 37901                                  ;
 37902                                  ;   HISTORY
 37903                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37904                                  ;
 37905                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37906                                  
 37907                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37908 0000402C E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37909 0000402F 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37910 00004032 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37911 00004034 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37912 00004037 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37913 00004039 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37914                                  
 37915                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37916                                  ;
 37917                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37918                                  ;
 37919                                  ;   INPUT
 37920                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37921                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37922                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37923                                  ;
 37924                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37925                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37926                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37927                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37928                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37929                                  ;
 37930                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37931                                  ;       AX
 37932                                  ;
 37933                                  ;   NOTES
 37934                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37935                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37936                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37937                                  ;
 37938                                  ;   HISTORY
 37939                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37940                                  ;
 37941                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37942                                  
 37943                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37944                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37945                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37946                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37947                                       
 37948                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37949                                  
 37950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37951                                  ;
 37952                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37953                                  ;
 37954                                  ;   INPUT
 37955                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37956                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37957                                  ;
 37958                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37959                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37960                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37961                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37962                                  ;
 37963                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37964                                  ;       AX
 37965                                  ;
 37966                                  ;   NOTES
 37967                                  ;       None
 37968                                  ;
 37969                                  ;   HISTORY
 37970                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37971                                  ;
 37972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37973                                  
 37974                                  skip_line:
 37975 0000403B E82800                          call    get_char
 37976 0000403E 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37977                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37978 00004040 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37979 00004042 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37980                                  skip_line_done:
 37981                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37982 00004044 C3                              retn
 37983                                  
 37984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37985                                  ;
 37986                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37987                                  ;
 37988                                  ;   INPUT
 37989                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37990                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37991                                  ;
 37992                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37993                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37994                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37995                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37996                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37997                                  ;
 37998                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37999                                  ;       AX
 38000                                  ;
 38001                                  ;   NOTES
 38002                                  ;       None
 38003                                  ;
 38004                                  ;   HISTORY
 38005                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38006                                  ;
 38007                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38008                                  
 38009                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38010                                  
 38011                                  get_number:
 38012 00004045 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38013                                  num_loop:
 38014 00004047 E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38015 0000404A 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38016 0000404C 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38017 0000404E 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38018 00004050 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38019 00004052 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38020 00004054 50                              push    ax              ;
 38021 00004055 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38022 00004058 52                              push    dx              ;
 38023 00004059 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38024 0000405B 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38025 0000405C 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38026 0000405E 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38027 0000405F 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38028 00004061 98                              cbw                     ;
 38029 00004062 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38030 00004064 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38031                                  
 38032                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38033                                  ;num_done:
 38034                                          ;retn
 38035                                  
 38036                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38037                                  ;
 38038                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38039                                  ;
 38040                                  ;   INPUT
 38041                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38042                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38043                                  ;
 38044                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38045                                  ;       AL == next character
 38046                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38047                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38048                                  ;
 38049                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38050                                  ;       AX
 38051                                  ;
 38052                                  ;   NOTES
 38053                                  ;       None
 38054                                  ;
 38055                                  ;   HISTORY
 38056                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38057                                  ;
 38058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38059                                  
 38060                                  get_char:
 38061 00004066 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38062 00004069 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38063                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38064 0000406B 26                      	es	
 38065 0000406C AC                      	lodsb
 38066 0000406D 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38067 0000406F C3                              retn			;
 38068                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38069 00004070 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38070                                  nearby_ret:
 38071 00004073 C3                              retn
 38072                                  
 38073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38074                                  ;
 38075                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38076                                  ;
 38077                                  ;   INPUT
 38078                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38079                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38080                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38081                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38082                                  ;
 38083                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38084                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38085                                  ;
 38086                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38087                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38088                                  ;
 38089                                  ;   NOTES
 38090                                  ;       None
 38091                                  ;
 38092                                  ;   HISTORY
 38093                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38094                                  ;
 38095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38096                                  
 38097                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38098                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38099                                  
 38100                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38101                                  query_user:
 38102 00004074 F606[DE46]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38103                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38104 00004079 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38105 0000407B E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38106                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38107                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38108                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38109                                  qu_1:
 38110 0000407E F606[DE46]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38111 00004083 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38112 00004085 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38113 00004086 A0[9914]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38114 00004089 F606[DE46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38115 0000408E 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38116 00004090 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38117                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38118 00004092 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38119                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38120                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38121                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38122                                  
 38123                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38124 00004094 58                      	pop	ax
 38125 00004095 C3                      	retn

 38127                                  query_all:
 38128                                  
 38129                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38130                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38131                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38132                                  
 38133 00004096 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38134 00004097 BA[EC4C]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38135 0000409A 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38136 0000409C 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38137                                  
 38138 0000409E 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38139 000040A0 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38140 000040A2 BF[2B47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38141                                  find_match:                             ;
 38142 000040A5 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38143 000040A7 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38144 000040A9 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38145 000040AB 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38146 000040AC 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38147 000040AE 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38148 000040B0 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38149                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38150 000040B3 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38151                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38152 000040B5 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38153 000040B8 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38154 000040BA B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38155                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38156 000040BC 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38157 000040BE 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38158 000040BF 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38159 000040C1 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38160 000040C3 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38161 000040C5 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38162 000040C7 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38163 000040CA 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38164 000040CC B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38165                                  cmd_notset:
 38166 000040CE CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38167                                  line_print:                             ;
 38168                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38169 000040D0 26                              es
 38170 000040D1 AC                      	lodsb
 38171 000040D2 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38172 000040D4 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38173 000040D6 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38174                                  non_null:                               ;
 38175 000040D8 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38176 000040DA 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38177 000040DC 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38178                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38179 000040DE 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38180                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38181 000040E1 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38182                                  non_space:                              ;
 38183 000040E3 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38184 000040E5 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38185 000040E7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38186 000040E9 EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38187                                  
 38188                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38189 000040EB BA[8A4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38190                                  
 38191                                  generic_prompt:
 38192 000040EE E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38193                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38194 000040F1 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38195 000040F3 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38196 000040F5 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38197 000040F7 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38198 000040F9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38199 000040FC 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38200 000040FE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 38201 00004101 800E[DE46]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38202 00004106 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38203                                  not_func:
 38204 00004108 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38205 0000410A 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38206 0000410E 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38207 00004110 3A06[924C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38208 00004114 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38209 00004116 803E[9914]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38210 0000411B 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38211 0000411D 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38212 0000411F 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38213 00004121 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38214 00004126 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38215                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38216 00004129 E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38217 0000412C 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38218                                  
 38219 0000412D 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38220 00004131 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38221                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38222 00004133 F8                      	clc
 38223                                  do_cmd:
 38224 00004134 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38225                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38226                                  	; cf=0
 38227                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38228 00004135 C3                      	retn
 38229                                  
 38230                                  skip_cmd:
 38231 00004136 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38232                                  skip_all:
 38233 00004137 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38234 00004139 F9                      	stc
 38235 0000413A C3                      	retn

 38292                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38293                                  
 38294                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38295                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38296                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38297                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38298                                  
 38299                                  disable_autoexec:
 38300                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38301                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38302                                  
 38303 0000416F F606[DE46]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38304 00004174 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38305 00004176 F606[D446]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38306 0000417B 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38307 0000417D 800E[D446]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38308                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38309 00004182 810E[DE46]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38310 00004188 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38311                                  dae_1:
 38312                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38313 0000418B A0[1346]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38314                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38315 0000418E 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38316 00004190 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38317 00004192 8A1E[1446]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38318 00004196 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38319 00004198 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38320 0000419A 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38321 0000419D 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38322 000041A0 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38323 000041A2 881E[1446]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38324 000041A6 81C3[1546]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38325 000041AA 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38326                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38327 000041AB 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38328 000041AE 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38329 000041B0 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38330 000041B1 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38331 000041B3 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38332                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38333 000041B6 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38334                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38335                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38336 000041B9 C3                              retn
 38337

 38369                                  any_delim:

 38371 000041D4 7427                    	je	short delim_ret

 38373 000041D8 7423                    	je	short delim_ret

 38376 000041DE 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 38377 000041E0 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 38378                                  ;
 38379                                  ;;endif ;MULTI_CONFIG

 38383                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 38384                                  delim:

 38386 000041E4 7417                    	je	short delim_ret

 38389 000041E8 7413                    	je	short delim_ret

 38392 000041EA 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.

 38397 000041F4 7407                    	je	short delim_ret

 38399 000041F8 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 38400 000041FA 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 38401                                  
 38402                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38403                                  
 38404                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 38405                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG

 38407 000041FC F8                      	clc
 38408                                  ;endif
 38409                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38410                                  delim_ret:
 38411                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38412                                  	; cf = 0
 38413                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 38414 000041FD C3                      	retn

 38475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38476                                  ; 
 38477                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38478                                  ;
 38479                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38480                                  
 38481                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38482                                  
 38483                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38484                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38485                                  mapcase:
 38486 0000421E 51                      	push	cx
 38487 0000421F 56                      	push	si
 38488 00004220 1E                      	push	ds
 38489                                  
 38490 00004221 06                      	push	es
 38491 00004222 1F                      	pop	ds
 38492                                  
 38493                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38494                                  
 38495                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38496                                  
 38497                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38498 00004223 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38499                                  ;else
 38500                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38501                                  ;endif
 38502                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38503                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38504                                  	;xor	si, si
 38505                                  
 38506                                  convloop:
 38507 00004225 AC                      	lodsb
 38508 00004226 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38509 00004228 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38510 0000422A 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38511 0000422C 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38512 0000422E 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38513 00004230 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38514                                  noconv:
 38515                                  
 38516                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38517                                  
 38518                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38519                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38520                                  
 38521                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38522                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38523                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38524                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38525                                  ;
 38526 00004233 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38527 00004236 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38528 00004238 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38529 0000423A 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38530                                  check_eol:
 38531 0000423C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38532 0000423E 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38533 00004240 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38534 00004242 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38535                                  ;endif
 38536                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38537 00004244 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38538                                  convdone:
 38539 00004246 1F                      	pop	ds
 38540 00004247 5E                      	pop	si
 38541 00004248 59                      	pop	cx
 38542 00004249 C3                      	retn

 38545                                  ;
 38546                                  ; procedure : round
 38547                                  ;
 38548                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 38549                                  ; perform bounds check.
 38550                                  ;
 38551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38552                                  
 38553                                  round:
 38554                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38555 0000424A 1E                      	push	ds
 38556 0000424B 0E                      	push	cs
 38557 0000424C 1F                      	pop	ds
 38558                                  
 38559 0000424D 50                      	push	ax
 38560                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 38561 0000424E A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 38562                                  
 38563 00004251 E8DBCE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 38564                                  
 38565                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 38566 00004254 0106[6403]              	add	[memhi],ax
 38567                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 38568 00004258 C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 38569                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 38570 0000425E A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38571                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 38572 00004261 3B06[A502]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]

 38642                                  
 38643                                  todigit:
 38644 000042B5 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 38645                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 38646                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38647 000042B7 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 38648                                  	;cmp	al,9
 38649                                  	;ja	short notdig
 38650                                  	;clc
 38651                                  	;retn
 38652                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38653 000042B9 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 38654 000042BB F5                      	cmc
 38655                                  notdig:
 38656                                  	;stc
 38657                                  notdig2:
