 38660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38661                                  ;
 38662                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38663                                  ;
 38664                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38665                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38666                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38667                                  ;
 38668                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38669                                  
 38670                                  getnum:
 38671 000042BD 53                      	push	bx
 38672 000042BE 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38673                                  b2:
 38674 000042C0 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38675 000042C3 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38676                                  
 38677 000042C5 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38678 000042C6 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38679                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38680                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38681 000042C7 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38682 000042C9 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38683 000042CB 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38684 000042CC 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38685 000042CE 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38686 000042D1 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38687                                  
 38688 000042D3 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38689                                  
 38690 000042D4 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 38691 000042D7 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38692 000042D9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38693 000042DB 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38694 000042DD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38695 000042DF 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38696 000042E1 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38697 000042E3 7417                    	je	short b15
 38698 000042E5 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38699 000042EA 7410                    	je	short b15
 38700 000042EC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38701                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38702                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38703                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38704                                  	;nop
 38705 000042EE 740C                    	je	short b15
 38706 000042F0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38707 000042F2 7408                    	je	short b15
 38708 000042F4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38709 000042F6 7404                    	je	short b15
 38710 000042F8 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38711 000042FA 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38712                                  b15:
 38713 000042FC 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38714 00004301 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38715                                  b1:
 38716 00004306 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38717 00004308 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38718 0000430A 5B                      	pop	bx
 38719 0000430B C3                      	retn
 38720                                  badnum:
 38721                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38722                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38723 0000430C 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38724                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38725 0000430E 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38726 00004312 5B                      	pop	bx
 38727 00004313 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38728 00004314 C3                      	retn
 38729                                  
 38730                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38731                                  
 38732                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38733                                  
 38734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38735                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38736                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38737                                  ;	si = 0
 38738                                  ;	ax = country id
 38739                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38740                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38741                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38742                                  ;
 38743                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38744                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38745                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38746                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38747                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38748                                  
 38749                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38750                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38751                                  
 38752                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38753                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 38754                                  
 38755 00004315 57                      	push	di
 38756 00004316 50                      	push	ax
 38757 00004317 52                      	push	dx
 38758                                  
 38759 00004318 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38760 0000431A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38761 0000431C B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38762 0000431F E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38763 00004322 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38764                                  
 38765 00004324 06                      	push	es
 38766 00004325 56                      	push	si
 38767                                  
 38768 00004326 0E                      	push	cs
 38769 00004327 07                      	pop	es
 38770                                  
 38771 00004328 BF[7945]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38772 0000432B B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38773 0000432E F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38774                                  
 38775 00004330 5E                      	pop	si
 38776 00004331 07                      	pop	es
 38777 00004332 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38778                                  
 38779 00004334 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38780 00004337 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38781 0000433A 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38782                                  
 38783 0000433C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38784 0000433D 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38785 0000433F 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38786 00004342 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38787 00004345 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38788 00004348 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38789                                  
 38790 0000434A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38791 0000434C 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38792 00004350 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38793                                  
 38794 00004352 46                      	inc	si
 38795 00004353 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38796 00004354 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38797 00004355 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38798 00004356 5F                      	pop	di
 38799                                  
 38800                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38801 00004357 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38802 0000435A 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38803                                  
 38804                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38805                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38806                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38807 0000435C 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38808 0000435E 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38809 00004360 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38810 00004363 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38811                                  
 38812                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38813 00004365 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38814 00004367 46                      	inc	si
 38815 00004368 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38816 00004369 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38817                                  
 38818                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38819                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38820 0000436B 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38821                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38822 0000436C F9                      	stc
 38823 0000436D C3                      	retn
 38824                                  
 38825                                  setdosdata_fail:
 38826 0000436E 5E                      	pop	si
 38827 0000436F 59                      	pop	cx
 38828 00004370 5F                      	pop	di
 38829 00004371 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 38830                                  
 38831                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 38832 00004373 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38833                                  
 38834                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 38835 00004376 2E8916[8145]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 38836 0000437B 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 38837 0000437E 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 38838 00004381 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 38839 00004384 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 38840 00004387 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 38841                                  
 38842 00004389 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 38843 0000438B 46                      	inc	si
 38844 0000438C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 38845                                  
 38846                                  setdoscntry_data:
 38847 0000438D 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38848 0000438E 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 38849 0000438F 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 38850                                  
 38851 00004390 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 38852 00004393 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 38853 00004396 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 38854                                  
 38855 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 38856 0000439B 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38857 0000439E B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38858 000043A1 F9                      	stc
 38859 000043A2 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38860 000043A4 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38861                                  
 38862 000043A6 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38863 000043A9 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 38864 000043AC B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 38865 000043AE F9                      	stc
 38866 000043AF CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 38867 000043B1 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 38868                                  
 38869 000043B3 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38870 000043B5 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 38871                                  
 38872 000043B7 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 38873 000043BA 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38874 000043BD B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38875 000043C0 F9                      	stc
 38876 000043C1 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 38877 000043C3 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38878                                  
 38879 000043C5 56                      	push	si
 38880 000043C6 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 38881 000043C9 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 38882 000043CB 5E                      	pop	si
 38883 000043CC BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38884 000043CF 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 38885 000043D2 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 38886 000043D4 F9                      	stc
 38887 000043D5 CD21                    	int	21h
 38888 000043D7 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38889                                  
 38890 000043D9 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38891 000043DB 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 38892                                  
 38893 000043DD 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 38894 000043E0 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 38895 000043E3 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 38896 000043E5 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 38897 000043E6 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 38898 000043E7 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 38899 000043EB 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38900                                  
 38901                                  	;if	bugfix
 38902 000043ED E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 38903                                  	;endif
 38904                                  
 38905 000043F0 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 38906 000043F2 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 38907                                  
 38908 000043F4 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 38909                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 38910 000043F8 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]

 38912

 38914

 38917                                  	;mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 38918                                  	;pop	ax

 38920 000043FD 2EFF36[8145]            	push	word [cs:cntrycodepage_id]

 38930                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 38931 00004410 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 38932                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 38933

 38936 00004415 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left

 38994                                  
 38995                                  getcountrydestination:
 38996                                  
 38997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38998                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38999                                  ;
 39000                                  ;input: al - data id
 39001                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39002                                  ;on return:
 39003                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39004                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39005                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39006                                  
 39007                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39008                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39009                                  
 39010                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39011                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39012                                  
 39013 0000443A 51                      	push	cx
 39014                                  	;add	di,74
 39015 0000443B 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 39016                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 39017 0000443E 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 39018 00004441 47                      	inc	di
 39019 00004442 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 39020                                  
 39021                                  getcntrydest:
 39022 00004443 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 39023 00004446 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 39024                                  
 39025 00004448 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 39026 0000444C 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 39027                                  
 39028 0000444E 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 39029 00004451 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 39030                                  
 39031                                  getcntrydest_1:
 39032                                  	;add	di,41
 39033 00004453 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 39034                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 39035 00004456 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 39036 00004458 F9                      	stc
 39037                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 39038                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 39039                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39040 00004459 59                      	pop	cx
 39041 0000445A C3                      	retn

 39065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39066                                  
 39067                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39068                                  
 39069                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39070                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39071                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39072                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39073                                  ;
 39074                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39075                                  ;	 be moved.
 39076                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39077                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39078                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39079                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39080                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39081                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39083                                  
 39084 00004465 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39085 00004466 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39086 00004469 F9                      	stc
 39087 0000446A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39088 0000446C 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39089 0000446D 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39090                                  
 39091 0000446F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39092 00004471 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39093 00004473 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39094 00004475 F9                      	stc
 39095 00004476 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39096                                  ricb_exit:
 39097 00004478 C3                      	retn
 39098

 39100                                  
 39101                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39102                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39103                                  %if 0
 39104                                  
 39105                                  set_country_path:
 39106                                  
 39107                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39108                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39109                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39110                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39111                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39112                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39113                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39114                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39115                                  
 39116                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39117                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39118                                  
 39119                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39120                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39121                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39122                                  
 39123                                  	push	si
 39124                                  
 39125                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39126                                  	push	es
 39127                                  	pop	ds
 39128                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39129                                  
 39130                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39131                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39132                                  
 39133                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39134                                  	inc	si
 39135                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39136                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39137                                  
 39138                                  scp_default_drv:
 39139                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39140                                  	int	21h
 39141                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39142                                  
 39143                                  scp_setdrv:
 39144                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39145                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39146                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39147                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39148                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39149                                  
 39150                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39151                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39152                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39153                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39154                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39155                                  
 39156                                  scp_root_dir:
 39157                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39158                                  scp_path:
 39159                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39160                                  
 39161                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39162                                  scpath_exit:
 39163                                  
 39164                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39165                                  	push	es
 39166                                  	pop	ds
 39167                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39168                                  
 39169                                  	pop	si
 39170                                  	retn
 39171                                  
 39172                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39173                                  
 39174                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39175                                  
 39176                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39177                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39178                                  ;carry set if not.
 39179                                  
 39180                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39181                                  
 39182                                  	push	ax
 39183                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39184                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39185                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39186                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39187                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39188                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39189                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39190                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39191                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39192                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39193                                  
 39194                                  cdletter_no:
 39195                                  	stc
 39196                                  cdletter_exit:
 39197                                  	pop	ax
 39198                                  	retn
 39199                                  
 39200                                  %endif
 39201

 39204                                  move_asciiz:
 39205                                  
 39206                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 39207                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 39208                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39209                                  
 39210                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39211                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 39212                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 39213                                  
 39214                                  masciiz_loop:
 39215                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39216 00004479 F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 39217 0000447C A4                      	movsb
 39218                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 39219                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 39220 0000447D 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 39221 0000447F C3                      	retn
